equipment.name: Airborne Deployment
equipment.description: Select a model in your Suicide Squad crew before the game starts. This model is not deployed at the beginning of the game, but is instead held in reserve. At the beginning of the second round or any subsequent round, before determining who takes the lead, deploy the model in contact with any board edge, as long as the model’s base physically fits in the new position. The model may act normally in the round it arrives.

equipment.name: Aerial Locator System
equipment.description:
Once per game at the start of the round, before determining who takes the lead, you can target one model currently in play. For the remainder of the round the target is illuminated, as if affected by a Lantern. 
Note that unlike the Lantern or Lamppost rules, only the target model is illuminated, not other models within 4”. NB. The rules governing line of sight apply as normal.

equipment.description: Model’s Close Combat attacks gain the Steal trait.

equipment.name: Pitch Perfect Vocals
equipment.description: Model gains the Mixed Combat Style trait.

equipment.name: Surgeon Training
equipment.description: Model gains the Medic trait.

equipment.name: Poison Catalyst
equipment.description: Model gains the Poison Catalyst trait.

equipment.name: Bomb Specialist
equipment.description: Model gains the Mine trait.

equipment.name: Poison Training
equipment.description: Model gains the Poison Master trait.

equipment.name: Neurotoxic Drugs - Iceberg Lounge
equipment.description: Model gains +2 Movement and Dodge trait.

equipment.name: Silencer - Iceberg Lounge
equipment.description: One of the models ranged weapons gains the Silencer trait.

equipment.name: Weird Ammo - Iceberg Lounge
equipment.description: Model's Ranged attacks gain either the Enervating 2 or Anti-tank trait.

equipment.name: Mutation Serum - Iceberg Lounge
equipment.description: Model gains the Tough Skin and Desensitized trait.

equipment.name: Fear Gas Dispenser - Iceberg Lounge
equipment.description: Model gains the Inspire Fear trait.

equipment.name: Titan Dose - Iceberg Lounge
equipment.description: Model gains one Titan Dose.

equipment.name: Prototype Freeze Ray - Iceberg Lounge
equipment.description: Model gains the Ice Flash trait.

equipment.name: Queen of Hearts Mask
equipment.description: Model gains Assassin (1) and Order rules.

equipment.name: White Rabbit Mask
equipment.description: Model gains Fast (2) and Tireless rules.

equipment.name: Cheshire Cat mask
equipment.description: Model gains Stealth and Climbing Claws rules.

equipment.name: The Leader
equipment.description: Model gains I'm a Symbol, Investigator, Stay in Formation and Protect the Shadows rules.

equipment.name: The Shadows
equipment.description: Model gains Bat Beacon, Master of Stealth, Shadowed Nightmare and Shadows Agent rules.

equipment.name: Magazine
equipment.description: Model gains +1 Ammunition for one weapon.

equipment.name: Terrible Visage
equipment.description:
Model gains the Terrible Visage trait.
Terrible Visage: When this model is placed by the Nightmare trait, you may Move the targeted Suspect 4".

equipment.name: Fear Dampening
equipment.description:
Model gains the Fear Dampening trait.
Fear Dampening: Enemy models moving within this model's action radius suffer Impaired Movement.

equipment.name: Terror Invigoration
equipment.description:
Model gains the Terror Invigoration trait.
Terror Invigoration: This model may throw X additional dice when taking Attack and Defense rolls (X is the number of cards in your Terror Pile).

equipment.name: Disposable Nightmare
equipment.description:
Model gains the Disposable Nightmare trait.
Disposable Nightmare: When this model is removed, Discard a card from your deck.

equipment.name: Intensive Treatment
equipment.description:
Model gains the Intensive Treatment trait.
Intensive Treatment: When this model targets a friendly model with the Nightmare trait using the Subliminal Suggestion trait, the targeted model may Move 4" before making the Attack.

equipment.name: Fear Advantage
equipment.description: This model may use the Protect Me! Trait on a friendly model with the Nightmare trait without the need of performing an Effort.

equipment.name: Apparition
equipment.description:
Model gains the Apparition trait.
Apparition {SPECIAL_ICON}	Place this model in contact with the target friendly model that has the Nightmare trait, and then remove the target as a Casualty.

equipment.name: Handcuffs
equipment.description:
Model gains the Arrest trait.
Arrest {SPECIAL_ICON}	When in contact with a KO enemy model (not a Vehicle), this model may immediately remove the KO model from the game as a Casualty.

equipment.name: Neurotoxic Drugs
equipment.description: Model gains +2 Movement and Dodge trait.

equipment.name: Intense Fear
equipment.description:
Model gains the Intense Fear trait.
Intense Fear: At the end of step 6 of Prepare the Game, you must add a card from your Fear pile to your Objective deck.

equipment.name: Working in Advance
equipment.description:
Model gains the Working in Advance trait.
Working in Advance: At the end of step 6 of Prepare the Game, you must inflict the Terror effect onto an enemy model.

equipment.name: Ivy's Snow Coat
equipment.description: Model gains the Cold Acclimation trait.

equipment.name: Always Prepared
equipment.description: When this model Sets a Suspect, you may Set a Thwart within 4" of that Suspect.

equipment.name: Batclaw
equipment.description: Model gains the Batclaw trait.

equipment.name: Heroic Jump
equipment.description: Model gains the Super Jump trait.

equipment.name: Spray Can
equipment.description: Model gains 1 Spray Can.

equipment.name: Investigator
equipment.description: Model gains the Investigator trait.

equipment.name: Magazine
equipment.description: Model gains +1 Ammunition for one weapon.

equipment.name: Halt!
equipment.description: Model gains the Stop! trait.

equipment.name: Comrades
equipment.description: Model gains the Teamwork (1) (Spades, Clubs, Diamonds, Hearts) trait.

equipment.name: Royal Communication Device
equipment.description: Model gains the Radio trait.

equipment.name: Grapple Gun
equipment.description: Model gains the Grapple Gun trait.

equipment.name: Royal Medic
equipment.description: Model gains the Medic trait.

equipment.name: The Good King
equipment.description: Model gains the Leadership trait.

equipment.name: Last Service
equipment.description: When a friendly model is removed as a Casualty within 8" and LoS to this model, you can search into your Objective deck 1 card and add it to your hand.

equipment.name: Poison Training
equipment.description: Model gains the Poison Master trait.

equipment.name: Punchline's Toys
equipment.description: Model gains the Poison Device trait.

equipment.name: Familiar with the Subject
equipment.description: When this model places a Suspect within 4" of an enemy model, you can search for a card that haves the same Suit as this model Keyword.

equipment.name: Back on Track
equipment.description: If this model has a Task counter on it, this model can be targeted by a Cranial Bomb Activated card, then return it to the Cranial Bomb pile without removing this model. If you do so, remove the Task counter from this model.

equipment.name: Fervent Follower
equipment.description: Model gains the Fervent Follower trait.

equipment.name: Improvised Armor
equipment.description: Model gains the Hockey Gear rule.

equipment.name: Camo Vest
equipment.description: Model gains the Stealth rule.

equipment.name: Right Motivation
equipment.description: While this model does not have a Task counter, it gains a free Manipulate action.

equipment.name: Growing Anger
equipment.description: While you have more than 5 Faith points, this model gains a +1 bonus to its Attack dice rolls when performing Melee Attacks.

equipment.name: King's Call
equipment.description:
During this model activation you can spend 1 Action to place within 4" a previously removed as Casualty model with the trait For My Lords!
If you do, the opponent immediately gains a Pass marker.

equipment.name: Levy's Work
equipment.description: This model can activate a 2nd time each round, at the end of that 2nd activation, this model suffers {BLOOD_ICON}{BLOOD_ICON} (you can force this model to be removed as casualty by the use of this trait).

equipment.name: Hidden Sniper
equipment.description: Model gains the Hidden Sniper trait.

equipment.name: Old Fighter
equipment.description: Model gains +1 to its Defense Skill.

equipment.name: Old Runner
equipment.description: Model gains +4 to its Movement Skill.

equipment.name: Father Teamwork
equipment.description: Model gains the Teamwork (1) (Ravager (Vanguard Team)) trait.

equipment.name: Daughter Teamwork
equipment.description: Model gains the Teamwork (1) (Deathstroke (Vanguard Team)) trait.

equipment.name: Improved Batclaw
equipment.description: This model's Batclaw/Grapple Gun trait provides +8" when used instead of 6".

equipment.name: Improved Bat-Armor
equipment.description: This model gains +1 to Defense rolls while it also benefits from the Bat-Armor Mk II trait.

equipment.name: Improved Batlings
equipment.description: This model Ranged Attacks with a weapon with the Throwing trait gains +1 to Hit and the Strength die always hits on a result of 3+. Ignore the wielder’s Strength for the Strength die roll.

equipment.name: Improved Reinforced Gloves
equipment.description: When this model attacks unarmed and using the Reinforced Gloves trait, it also imposes a -1 to the target to Block.

traits.name: A Challenge for you
traits.description: Every time your crew places a Suspect, you must place a Numeric Counter on it. You decide the number on the counter, unless a card or ability specifies the number. These Numeric Counters cannot be reduced below 0.

traits.name: Absolute Power
traits.description: If this model is your crew’s Boss, you can hire models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} with the Cop trait, regardless of their Affiliation. In addition, this model's Inspire radius is increased by 4".

traits.name: Acrobat
traits.description:
This model does not suffer Impaired Movement for Jumping, or for Stand Up actions. This model may use the Dodging rule.

Dodging: 
A model that benefits from this rule may make an Effort to reduce the attack dice from a Ranged Attack that targets this model.

traits.name: Adaptable
traits.description: At the beginning of the Raise the Plan phase, the player controlling this model must choose between the Attack (+1), Defense (+1) or Movement (+2) basic skills. The model receives the bonus to the chosen skill until the end of the round.

traits.name: Addict
traits.description: This model suffers -1 to its Attacks and Defense skills unless it uses a Dose. As soon as the model uses a Dose, the penalties cease to apply until the end of the round.

traits.name: Affinity (Model)
traits.description: This model may be recruited by any crew that also includes the model named in parentheses, even if they would not ordinarily be permitted to join that crew. This model may treat its rank as {RANK_FREEAGENT_ICON} for the purposes of forming the crew (but cannot use the Rank {RANK_FREEAGENT_ICON} during the game). Recruiting this model does not allow a further use of the trait (if, for example, another character has an Affinity to this model).

traits.name: Aggressive Schizophrenia (Mental Disorder)
traits.description: If this model is in contact with another model (friend or foe) at the beginning of its activation, it gains an extra Attack action, which must immediately be performed against one model in contact. Once this attack is resolved, this model may continue its turn normally.

traits.name: Air Support {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Place the Explosive template anywhere on the board. During this round, the area under the template is under the effect of Lights.

traits.name: Agile
traits.description: This model can’t suffer Falling Damage. However, if the result of the Fall is to remove the model from the game, it is still made a Casualty.

traits.name: Amazon
traits.description: This model receives a +1 bonus to its Attack and Defense rolls. In addition, enemy models roll 1 less attack die when targeting this model.

traits.name: Amazon Lineage
traits.description: If this model is your crew’s Boss, you can only recruit models with the Amazon trait.

traits.name: Amazon Princess
traits.description: This model automatically gains the Charge trait. However, targets of this model’s Charge incur a -1 penalty to their Defense rolls. While this Upgrade Character Card is added to Wonder Woman, she cannot use the Bracelets of Submission trait or the Lasso of Hestia weapon, and does not benefit from the effects of her Magic Shield.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: This model does not suffer Impaired Movement when moving through Difficult Ground elements that are considered water (i.e. rivers, swamps, canals, ponds, etc.). Players should agree on what counts as a water feature before the game begins. In addition, this Model can enter a Sewer without performing a Manipulate action.

traits.name: Anger Management (Mental disorder)
traits.description: During this model activation, it must make an Attack Action unless it makes an Effort.

traits.name: Animal
traits.description:
When this model moves, it can ignore obstacles up to 2” high, but cannot Climb or Jump. If this model suffers the Fire Status, during the Recount phase (before resolving the Status) make a Willpower roll (which cannot be re-rolled). If this roll is failed, the model cannot move in the following round. 
This model cannot purchase equipment.

traits.name: Archie
traits.description:
A model with the Archie trait is not deployed as usual – instead, during a friendly model’s activation, you may place this model in contact with a friendly Suspect and then remove that Suspect.  Always are considered an activable model and inside the gaming area until they are removed as a Casualty.

• A model with Archie may receive an Audacity marker even if it is not in play.

traits.name: Arkham Asylum Dr
traits.description: When this model places a Suspect, target a model within 8" and LoS, make an Opposed Willpower roll against it. If successful, the target is considered to have a Mental Disorder until the end of the round.

traits.name: Arrest {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: When in contact with a KO enemy model (not a Vehicle), this model may immediately remove the KO model from the game as a Casualty.

traits.name: Arrogant
traits.description: When this model performs an Attack against a model with a lower Reputation cost than its own, it rolls one less attack die.

traits.name: Assassin (X)
traits.description: If this model removes an enemy model as a Casualty, you may draw X Objective card from your Objective deck.

traits.name: Assistance
traits.description: While a friendly Robin (Boy Wonder) is in play, this model gains +1 Willpower. If a friendly Robin (Boy Wonder) is removed as a Casualty, this model gains +1 Strength until the end of the game.

traits.name: Atomica
traits.description: When this model attacks an enemy model (not a Vehicle), the enemy model must pass a Willpower roll before any attack dice are rolled. If it fails, it suffers -1 Defense until the end of the round.

traits.name: Attorney’s Allegation {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: One Use Only. All friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} within 8” gain 1 extra Action.

traits.name: Autorepair (X)
traits.description: At the beginning of the Recount phase, this model rolls 1D6. On a result of (X)+ remove a Damage marker (any type) from this model.

traits.name: Aversion (X)
traits.description: This model cannot be included in the same crew as the specified model.

traits.name: Backpack
traits.description: This model can perform a Reveal Manipulate action once per activation without spending an Action.

traits.name: Bat-Armor Mk I
traits.description: Enemy models don’t roll a Strength die when attacking this model.

traits.name: Bat-Armor Mk II
traits.description: This model ignores enemy Strength dice unless the roll is a natural 6. In addition, this model gains +1” to its basic move distance.

traits.name: Bat-Armor Mk III
traits.description: Enemy models don’t roll a Strength die when attacking this model. In addition, if this model has moved this activation, it can make Melee Attacks against enemies up to 2” away in line of sight (ignore all traits that improve the model’s line of sight, such as Total Vision, for the purpose of these attacks).

traits.name: Bat Cape
traits.description: This model does not take Damage, nor can it be removed as a Casualty, as a result of Falling.

traits.name: Batclaw/Grapple Gun {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description:
Once per round, this model gains +6” to its basic move distance, and can move in any direction (including vertically). When using this ability, the model can move over obstacles and Difficult Ground without penalty. However, the model cannot use this rule in two consecutive activations.

*Some models list this trait as ‘Grapple Gun’, and others as ‘Batclaw’. The rules are the same in both instances - the distinction is just for fun!

traits.name: Bipolar (Mental Disorder)
traits.description: At the beginning of this model’s activation, roll a die or flip a coin. If the result is even/heads, this model may make 1 Effort this round without taking a {STUN_ICON} marker. If the result is odd/tails, this model suffers the Enervating (1) Status.

traits.name: Bloodthirsty (Mental Disorder)
traits.description: During the Raise the Plan phase, if this model has at least 1 Damage marker of any kind, it gains +1 {+ATT_ICON}.

traits.name: Bluff {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose an enemy model within 6” and line of sight. The target reduces its Attacks skill by 1 until the end of the round. If multiple models with this trait target the same model, the effect is not cumulative.

traits.name: Bodyguard
traits.description: If a friendly model with the {CROWN_ICON} marker within 4” of this model and LoS suffers any number of hits from an Attack (of any kind), this model may make an Effort to take the hits instead, and all the Status of that attack. Only one Effort {STUN_ICON} is required per enemy Attack.

traits.name: Bonebreaker {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of the round, this model’s unarmed attacks gain Bleed: 2.

traits.name: Boss’s Orders {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: All friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} that attack an enemy model within 8” of this model gain +1 to their attack dice rolls in close combat until the end of the round.

traits.name: Bot Bomb {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose one of your models with the Bot trait to explode. Center the Explosion template over the bot. Roll a Strength 4+ die against each model affected. On a success, the model suffers {BLOOD_ICON}{BLOOD_ICON} Damage. Once the trait is resolved, remove the Bot as a Casualty.

traits.name: Bot
traits.description: This model cannot recover from KO or recover Stun damage in the Recount phase. However, attacks with the Firearm, Mechanical and Beam rule deduct 1 attack die when rolling against this model. In addition, this model cannot use Doses of any kind, and is immune to the Enervating, Hypnotize, Poison, Scared and Terror Status.

traits.name: Bot Mechanic {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a model with the Bot trait within 4” and Line of Sight. Remove up to 3 Damage markers from that model.

traits.name: Boy Wonder
traits.description: Enemy models cannot reroll attack dice against this model granted by the Handy rule.

traits.name: Bracelets of submission
traits.description: The first time this model is selected as a target by an enemy ranged attack in each round, it reduces the attacker’s RoF by -1.

traits.name: Brutal
traits.description: This model scores Critical results on a natural roll of 5 or 6.

traits.name: Bullet Time {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: One use only. After activating this trait, if this model performs a Ranged Attack, it gains an extra Ranged Attack action. The model cannot use the same ranged weapon more than once. This model doesn’t lose attack dice this round for firing after moving.

traits.name: Bulletproof Vest
traits.description: Traits and attacks with the Firearm rule deduct 1 attack die when rolling against this model.

traits.name: Business Agent
traits.description: When this model is recruited, add $350 to the crew’s available Funding.

traits.name: Canary Cry {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Place the Spray template in base contact with this model – all models affected receive one automatic hit and are moved 2" directly away from this model and suffers the Sonic Status. Then, affected models must pass a Endurance roll or take {BLOOD_ICON} Damage and become Stunned.

traits.name: Cannibal
traits.description: When this model removes an enemy model (not a Vehicle) as a Casualty in Melee, remove up to 2 Damage markers from this model.

traits.name: Can You Solve This? (X)
traits.description: Once per round, this model may move up to 4” a suspect marker within 4” during its activation by rolling a +(X) result in a die roll.

traits.name: Catcher Gear
traits.description: Enemies attacking this model never benefit from the Heavy weapon special rule.

traits.name: Chain of Command
traits.description: When its crew’s Boss becomes a Casualty, this model immediately becomes the new Boss, taking the {CROWN_ICON} Marker . This model does not halve the range of the Inspire trait when taking over as Boss. If more than one model in the crew has this trait, or another trait with the same effect (such as Hidden Boss) the controlling player must choose between them.

traits.name: Chill Touch
traits.description: Unarmed Melee Attacks made by this model deal {BLOOD_ICON} and gain CRT: Cold.

traits.name: Chaotic Friends
traits.description: Friendly models with the Gotham City Siren trait in this model’s crew gain the Unpredictable rule until the end of the game.

traits.name: Charismatic
traits.description: A crew that includes this model can recruit 1 additional model with Rank {RANK_FREEAGENT_ICON}, ignoring the usual restrictions.

traits.name: Charm
traits.description: Whenever this model becomes the target of a Melee Attack, the attacker must pass a Willpower roll or the attack automatically fails.

traits.name: Chlorokinesis {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model can be removed from one point inside of a Plant’s action zone, and placed at another point in the same action zone.

traits.name: Claws
traits.description: This model’s Unarmed attacks inflict Damage {BLOOD_ICON}{STUN_ICON}.

traits.name: Climbing Claws
traits.description: This model never suffers Impaired Movement when Climbing. In addition, the model may end its movement at any point on a climbable surface, such as on the side of a wall. Make the model’s end position clear to the opposing player if it is not possible to physically place the model there.

traits.name: Close Combat Master
traits.description: When fighting Unarmed, this model may reroll failed attack dice in Melee.

traits.name: Combat Flip {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This trait may be used when the model is in contact with an enemy or if a result of using it, this model ends in contact with an enemy model. Move this model 3”.

traits.name: Combo (Weapon)
traits.description: For every two successful hits in its attack roll while using the specified (weapon) or (trait) (before the enemy rolls to defend), this model gains an additional hit.

traits.name: Commissioner
traits.description: Friendly models with the Arrest trait within 6” of this model can use that trait as an extra action. In addition, friendly models within 8" of this model with with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} and the Cop trait, are treated as though it were within range of it's Boss's Inspire trait.

traits.name: Concealment {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of the round in which this ability is used, enemy models can only see this model if it is in contact with them. This ability works even when the model is within the area of effect of a Light. However, the model is still subject to other rules that aid detection, such as Total Vision or Superior Sense of Smell, etc. This model can be affected by templates, but cannot be targeted directly.

traits.name: Confusion {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model (not a Vehicle) within 8” and line of sight. Perform an opposed Willpower roll against the target. If successful, reduce the target model’s Attack and Defense skills by 1. Also, the target cannot perform Special Actions. Both effects last until the end of the round.

traits.name: Control Pheromones {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose an enemy model (not a Vehicle) within 5” and line of sight. The target immediately suffers the Hypnotize Status.

traits.name: Cop
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Corrupt
traits.description: If this model is included your crew, you can recruit up to 3 models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} with the Cop trait. Additional models in the crew with this trait have no further effect.

traits.name: Counter Attack
traits.description: When targeted by a Melee Attack, this model can make an Effort to activate this trait. For the remainder of the activation, when this model successfully defends against an enemy Melee Attack, this model gains one Counter Attack for every attack blocked. Once the enemy attack is resolved, assuming this model is not KO or a Casualty, each Counter Attack is converted into an automatic hit against the attacker, calculated as per this model’s preferred Melee Weapon. These Counter Attacks are resolved immediately, out of sequence. After resolving the Counter Attacks, play resumes as normal.

traits.name: Court of Owls Crew
traits.description: This crew can only hire models with the Affiliation: The Court of Owls.

traits.name: Coward’s Reward
traits.description: If this model is not KO when an enemy model moves out of contact from this model, that enemy suffers {BLOOD_ICON}.

traits.name: Criminal
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Criminology
traits.description: All enemy models within 12” of this model lose the benefit of the Runaway trait.

traits.name: Critical Strike {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: After activating this trait, any Melee Attacks performed by this model automatically treat the Strength die as scoring a natural 6. No die is rolled, but the success is counted.

traits.name: Cruel {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose a KO enemy (not a Vehicle) in contact. That model is removed from play as a Casualty.

traits.name: Cybernetic
traits.description: This model gains +1 to its Defense rolls, and can reroll Recovery rolls.

traits.name: Cyclops
traits.description: This model’s ranged attacks gain the Imprecise rule when the target is more than 8” away.

traits.name: Daddy’s Girrrl
traits.description: If this model starts its activation within 6” of the Boss, its gains +1 {+ATT_ICON}.

traits.name: Death Marks
traits.description: When this model inflicts a Casualty, it gains +2 {+ATT_ICON} or +2 {+DEF_ICON} or {MOV+4_ICON}.

traits.name: Death or Exile {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target one KO model (not a Vehicle) within 8” and line of sight. The target model is removed as a Casualty.

traits.name: Death Pack
traits.description: If the target of this model’s Melee Attack is already in contact with one or more other friendly models with this trait, this model gains a +1 bonus to its attack dice rolls, and one extra attack die against that target.

traits.name: Delirium
traits.description: In the Recount phase, this model does not recover {STUN_ICON} Damage, and cannot take rolls to Recover from KO.

traits.name: Demoralize {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: All enemy models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} within 6” suffer the Enervating 1 Status.

traits.name: Demotivate {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a model within 8” and line of sight. That model must pass a Willpower roll or immediately suffer the Enervating (2) Status.

traits.name: Desensitized
traits.description: This model can never suffer Knocked Out, once this model has {STUN_ICON} equal to its willpower, any subsequent attack that targets it changes all {STUN_ICON} to {BLOOD_ICON}.

traits.name: Detective
traits.description: This model may place or reveal a Suspect marker within 3” and LoS instead of in contact.

traits.name: Detective Mode
traits.description: This model does ignores the rules of a Smoke event marker.

traits.name: Direct Connection to the Speed Force
traits.description: This model may reroll the Paradox roll.

traits.name: Dirty Fighter
traits.description: This model can perform Ranged Attacks even if it is in contact with enemy models. If it uses a ranged weapon to target an enemy model in contact, it gains +1 to its attack dice rolls.

traits.name: Dirty Money
traits.description: If this model is the Boss, its crew has an extra $300 Funding.

traits.name: Disarray {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model within 8” and Line of Sight. If that model has an Audacity marker, you can move the marker to another enemy model within 8” that has yet to activate, and does not already have an Audacity marker.

traits.name: Discourage {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose an enemy model (not a Vehicle) within 8” and line of sight. Perform an opposed Willpower roll against the target. If successful, the target model suffers -2 to its Willpower value when performing a Willpower roll until the end of the round.

traits.name: Disruptor {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target one enemy model within 8” and line of sight. The target cannot use ranged weapons with the Firearm or Beam rule this round.

traits.name: Distract {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target one enemy model within 4” and line of sight. The target reduces its Defense skill by -1 until the end of the round. If multiple models with this trait target the same model, the effect is not cumulative.

traits.name: Disturb {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model within 8” and line of sight that is yet to activate this round. Make an opposed Willpower roll against that model. If successful, you may look at the opponent’s Objective card hand, and Discard one of the cards.

traits.name: Dodge
traits.description:
This model can use the Dodging rule.

Dodging: 
A model that benefits from this rule may make an Effort to reduce the attack dice from a Ranged Attack that targets this model.

traits.name: Dollotrons
traits.description: When you recruit Professor Pyg, you must also recruit three Dollotron models, at no additional Reputation cost.

traits.name: Duelist
traits.description: While in contact with only one enemy model, this model may reroll failed attack dice rolls in Melee.

traits.name: Duke of Duality
traits.description: When this model scores an Objective card, flip a coin or roll a D6: if the result is ‘heads’ (or an even number) draw an additional card. If the result is ‘tails’ (or an odd number), Discard an Objective card at random before drawing a new card.

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.description: This model does not suffer the Blind Status and ignores the rules of a Smoke event marker. In addition, this model may see at any distance, limited only by Line of Sight and intervening scenery.

traits.name: ECM
traits.description: All Light sources within 6” of this model are nullified (effectively illuminating an area of 0”).

traits.name: Electric Handshake {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose a model in contact. The target model must pass a Willpower roll or suffer the Stunned Status.

traits.name: Elite (Type)
traits.description: Your crew can only include 1 Elite model of each (Type), unless you also include the Elite Boss: (Type).

traits.name: Elite Boss (Type)
traits.description: If your crew includes a model with this trait, you may include any number of Elite models of the same (Type) as the Elite Boss (following the normal restrictions for forming a crew).

traits.name: Elusive
traits.description: When targeted by a Ranged Attack, this model may make an Effort to force the attacker to reroll one attack die.

traits.name: EMP
traits.description: This model rerolls failed Strength die rolls against models with the Cybernetic, Bot or Robot traits, and against models with Rank {RANK_VEHICLE_ICON}.

traits.name: Enemies of the Court
traits.description: Any friendly model, can spend a Special Action to, interrupt the activation to perform immediately a free Special Action with this model.

traits.name: Energy Field
traits.description: Roll 1D6 for each hit this model suffers from a Ranged Attack. On a result of 5+, the hit is ignored.

traits.name: Enhanced Vision
traits.description: This model can see at any distance and ignores the Concealment trait. In addition, the model is immune to the Blind Status.

traits.name: Escape Artist
traits.description: After resolving an enemy attack against this model, as long as it is not made KO or a Casualty, it may immediately move up to 4”.

traits.name: Exhaustive Planner
traits.description: One use only. When the opponent plays an Objective card as a Resource, this model can cancel that card’s effect. The opponent must immediately Discard the card.

traits.name: Expendable
traits.description: When this model is removed from the game as a Casualty, you may draw an Objective card.

traits.name: Experimental Ammo
traits.description: This model can’t Manipulate Ammo Crates.

traits.name: Expert Marksman
traits.description:
This model gains a +1 bonus to its attack dice rolls when performing Ranged Attacks.
Note: This trait is also called Ranged Master on some character cards.

traits.name: Explosive Gel
traits.description: Once per activation, this model may mark a Streetlamp, Sewer or Suspect marker in contact as being sprayed with Explosive Gel (use a spare token or dice to remind you). In any subsequent activation, this model may use a Manipulate action to destroy any number of marked items. Center an Explosive template on each chosen marker, and roll a Strength 3+ die against each affected model. Any model hit suffers {STUN_ICON}{STUN_ICON} Damage. Then, remove that marked items from the game

traits.name: Extremely mutated
traits.description: This model cannot buy more than one item of Equipment.

traits.name: Fast (X)
traits.description: Once per round this model may move X" when a model resolves an action.

traits.name: Feint {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a single enemy model in contact with this model and take a Willpower roll. If the roll is successful, the target can’t make an Effort against this model’s attacks this round.

traits.name: Feral {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Once this trait is activated, this model’s Melee Attacks this round gain a +1 bonus to attack dice rolls, and inflicts the the Slow (2) Status.

traits.name: Ferocious
traits.description: This model’s Melee Attacks gain the Push (2) Status.

traits.name: Flak Armor
traits.description: This model is immune to Damage caused by hits with the Explosive and/or Expansive rules.

traits.name: Flare
traits.description: One use only. Make the entire gaming area count as being under the effect of Light until the end of round.

traits.name: Fly {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Once per round, this model may add +8” to its basic move distance, and can move in any direction (including vertically). When using this ability, the model can move over obstacles and Difficult Ground without extra cost or penalty.

traits.name: Flying High {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: One use only. This model may add +20” to its basic move distance, and can move in any direction (including vertically). When using this ability, the model can move over obstacles and Difficult Ground without extra cost or penalty.

traits.name: Follow Me! {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose a friendly model with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} within 4” of this model (but not the activated model itself). That model gains a {MOV+4_ICON} Marker.

traits.name: Football Gear
traits.description: Enemies attacking this model never benefit from the Sharp and Heavy weapon special rules.

traits.name: For the Family
traits.description:
If a friendly Carmine Falcone within 4” and LoS of this model suffers any number of hits from an Attack (of any kind), this model may make an Effort to take the hits instead and all the
Status of that attack. Only one Effort {STUN_ICON} is required per enemy Attack. This trait can’t be used against attacks from a model with Name: Selina Kyle.

traits.name: Fully Equipped
traits.description: This model cannot purchase any Equipment.

traits.name: Get ’Em {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: One friendly model within 8” and line of sight of this model gains +2 {+ATT_ICON}.

traits.name: Goad {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target one enemy model (not a Vehicle) within 8” and line of sight, and take an opposed Willpower roll against it. If you succeed, you may move the enemy model up to 4”, following all of the usual Movement rules. During this movement, you cannot force the target to Fall.

traits.name: Funny Bomb {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Center the Explosive template over this model. This is resolved as an Explosive Ranged Attack, rolling a Strength 3+ die for each affected model – on a successful roll, the model receives {BLOOD_ICON}{STUN_ICON} Damage. Once this action is resolved, remove this model as a Casualty.

traits.name: Gas Mask
traits.description: This model ignores Damage and Status caused by any Attack or trait with the Gas special rule.

traits.name: Good Aim {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description:
During this model's next Ranged attack this activation, before rolling, roll one of your attack dice, on a 2+ that die is a successful hit.
If it fails, remove it from the attack.

traits.name: Gotham City Siren
traits.description: One use only. Target another friendly model with this trait within 4” – the target gains +2 {+ATT_ICON} or {+DEF_ICON}.

traits.name: Greed
traits.description: This model cannot contribute to or fulfill criteria for Objective cards that award VP for inflicting Damage, making models KO, or removing models as Casualties.

traits.name: Green Travel {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: One use only. Remove this model and immediately place it up to 20” away. A model may not perform a Movement Action in the same round that it uses Green Travel.

traits.name: Grin Twins
traits.description: This model gains +1 to Attack, Defense and Willpower while there is at least one other friendly model in play with this trait.

traits.name: Gunman {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: After activating this trait, the first time this model performs a Ranged Attack this activation, it gains an extra Ranged Attack action.

traits.name: Hacking {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model may move up to 2 markers within 8” up to 4”.

traits.name: Handyman
traits.description: This model can make an extra Manipulate action during its activation. Also, this model can use a Manipulate action in contact with a model with Rank {RANK_VEHICLE_ICON} to remove up to 2 Damage markers from it.

traits.name: Hard Guys
traits.description: If this model is your Boss, friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} that attack with Brass Knuckles or Reinforced Gloves may re-roll failed Strength die rolls.

traits.name: Hardened
traits.description: When this model suffers Damage, it can choose to change the Damage type of up to 1 Damage marker received.

traits.name: Hates (Crew/s)
traits.description: This model can never be Included in the specified (crew/s).

traits.name: Hates Humanity
traits.description: This model cannot be affected by friendly models’ traits.

traits.name: Heavy Armor
traits.description: Enemy models roll 3 less attack dice when targeting this model.

traits.name: Heir to the Cowl
traits.description: When forming your crew, if there is no model with the Alias: Batman (any version) in the same crew, this model changes its rank to {RANK_LEADER_ICON}.

traits.name: Henchman Bomb {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: One use only. This model may choose one friendly model with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} and center an Explosive template on it. This is resolved as an Explosive Ranged Attack, rolling a Strength 2+ die for each affected model, and inflicting Damage {BLOOD_ICON}{BLOOD_ICON}{BLOOD_ICON} on a successful roll. After resolving this attack, the chosen model is removed as a casualty.

traits.name: Heroic {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target any one friendly model on the board. That model can perform 1 extra Action this round.

traits.name: Hidden
traits.description: Before both groups of both crews are selected, left this model aside. When both groups are deployed, this model may be deployed anywhere on the gaming area. If both sides have Hidden models, start with the player with setup initiative. This model must be placed out of line of sight of all enemy models if possible, or at least 12” away from enemy models that can see it. If this is not possible, this model must be deployed in the usual deployment zone.

traits.name: Hidden Boss
traits.description: When its crew’s Boss becomes a Casualty, this model immediately becomes the new Boss, taking the {CROWN_ICON} marker. Increase this model’s Willpower by +1 for the rest of the game. In addition, this model does not halve the range of the Inspire trait when taking over as Boss. If more than one model in the crew has this trait, or another trait with the same effect (such as Chain of Command) the controlling player must choose between them.

traits.name: Hidden Sniper {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model that this model can see, and that is also within 12” of any board edge. The target receives a Ranged Attack, ignoring Cover. This attack has RoF 1, Damage {BLOOD_ICON}{BLOOD_ICON}, and the Firearm rule.

traits.name: Hockey Gear
traits.description: Enemies attacking this model never benefit from the Sharp weapon special rule.

traits.name: Hover
traits.description: At the start of this model’s activation, you may place a Hover marker on the character card until the end of the round, to show that it is in Hover mode. While a model is in Hover mode, it can only be hit in Melee on a natural result of 6. A model with a Hover marker cannot benefit from the Cover rule and cannot perform the Manipulate action.

traits.name: Huge
traits.description: This model ignores up to 2 {STUN_ICON} Damage per enemy Attack.

traits.name: I Believe in Harvey Dent
traits.description: If this model is the Boss, friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} must roll a die or flip a coin at the start of their activation. If the result is even/heads, that model gains 1 free Effort until the end of the round. If the result is odd/tails, it suffers Enervating 1.

traits.name: I Know What I’m Doing
traits.description: One use only. This model can ignore the result on the Paradox table. The Speed Power still fails.

traits.name: Ice Flash {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a model within 10” and LoS. That model must pass an Endurance roll, or suffers the Freeze Status. If it passes the Endurance roll, reduce its Defense skill by 1 and gain -2MOV until the end of the round.

traits.name: Immortal
traits.description: Removing this model as a Casualty cannot fulfill the requirements of an opponent’s Objective card.

traits.name: Incorporeal {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model is immune to {STUN_ICON} Damage until the end of the round. In addition, the model can move ‘through’ other models and scenery as though they weren’t there, but still cannot end its move overlapping another model or inside solid scenery.

traits.name: Informer
traits.description: As long as this model is not KO, the crew gains one additional Pass on Activation (not cumulative).

traits.name: Inspire
traits.description: All friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} that start their activation within 8” of this model gain 1 extra Manipulate action (not cumulative).

traits.name: Inspire Fear {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model (not a Vehicle) within 4” and LoS. The target must take a Willpower roll. If this roll is failed, consult the following chart (the results are cumulative): Fail by 1-2: Target suffers the Scared Status. Fail by 3-5: Target suffers the Terror and Slow (4) Status. Fails by 6 or more: Target receives {BLOOD_ICON} damage equal to half is Endurance (rounding down).

traits.name: Instinctive Shooting {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model immediately Move 4" and then may perform an extra Ranged Attack action that ignores the modifier Move before Attacking.

traits.name: Intimidate {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model (not a Vehicle) within 8” and line of sight. For the rest of the round, the target cannot perform Special Actions unless it Efforts 2 {STUN_ICON}, and to Effort during a Willpower roll must take 2 {STUN_ICON} instead of 1.

traits.name: Intimidation {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model (not a Vehicle) within 8” and line of sight.  The target must pass a Willpower roll or be unable to perform Melee Attacks this round.

traits.name: Invaluable
traits.description: When this model becomes a Casualty, the opponent gains 1 Resource point.

traits.name: Invulnerability (X)
traits.description: When this model takes damage from an attack or special rule, reduce the total number of Damage markers it receives by (X). In addition, this model is immune to CRT and ignores all Statuses except any it has “Weakness to”.

traits.name: I Will Break You
traits.description:
When you recruit this model, choose one of the following options:
• Bane gains +3 Extra Venom Doses and may apply them to a friendly model within 4” during his activation.
• Bane gains Exhaustive Planner and +1 Willpower.
• Bane Gains Close Combat Master.

traits.name: Joker's Gas {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: All other models within 4” and LoS suffer Enervating (1) and the Poison Statuses, with the Gas rule.

traits.name: Joy for the Victory
traits.description: Friendly models within 8” gains 1 Free Effort while performing Willpower rolls. In addition, inspired friendly models that score an Objective card during their activation may immediately remove 2 Damage.

traits.name: Judgment
traits.description: When this model makes an enemy model KO, flip a coin or roll a D6: if the result is ‘heads’ (or an even number) remove the enemy model as a Casualty.

traits.name: Jump Up
traits.description: Whenever this model would suffer the Knocked Down Status, it may first immediately make an Effort to remove that Status.

traits.name: Kaos Agent
traits.description: All friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} gain the Trickster trait for the duration of the game. You do not have to place all of your Audacity Activation markers during the Raise the Plan phase (or any, if you wish). Instead, whenever a friendly model with the Trickster trait activates, you may give it one of your remaining Audacity Activation markers.

traits.name: KaPow!!! {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of its activation this model’s Melee Attacks gain +1 to attack dice rolls and Blunt 3.

traits.name: Kevlar Vest
traits.description: Whenever this model takes Damage from an enemy attack or special rule, reduce the total number of Damage markers it receives by 1, to a minimum of 1. You may choose which marker is ignored.

traits.name: Kill them! {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a friendly model with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} within 4” of this model (but not the activated model itself). Target model gains +2 {+ATT_ICON}.

traits.name: Kryptonian (X)
traits.description:
A model with this trait gains a number of rules determined by the trait’s level (X), see below.

1: Fast, Invulnerability/1, Natural Immunities.
2: Fast, Invulnerability/2, Natural Immunities, Super Jump.
3: Fast, Fly, Invulnerability/3, Natural Immunities.
4: Fast, Fly, Invulnerability/3, Natural Immunities, Tough Skin.
5: Fast, Fly, Hover, Flying High, Invulnerability/4, Natural Immunities, Tough Skin.
6: Fast, Fly, Hover, Flying High, Invulnerability/5, Natural Immunities, Tough Skin.

If the game is affected by the Day rules, the Invulnerability rule is improved by +1 and all the levels gain the Regeneration trait.

traits.name: Kryptonite
traits.description: While a model with this trait is within 4” of a model with the Kryptonian trait, the Kryptonian model loses the Invulnerability and Regeneration traits (if they possess them).

traits.name: Lantern
traits.description: A model with this trait can activate it at any time during its activation. The model counts as a Light source with a radius of 2” until the end of the round.

traits.name: Master Fighter
traits.description: This model gains a +1 bonus to its attack dice rolls when performing Unarmed Melee Attacks.

traits.name: Reinforced Gloves
traits.description: This model’s Unarmed Melee Attacks inflict Damage {STUN_ICON}{STUN_ICON}.

traits.name: Veteran
traits.description: When one of your Objective cards requires the possession of a named trait to complete it, this model counts as having that trait (it can’t actually use the trait, but it is able to fulfill the Objectives). This trait is also considered a Keyword.

traits.name: Venom Dose (Dose)
traits.description: A model may use a Venom Dose when an action is declared. If it does so, for the rest of the round the model gains +1 to its Strength die rolls and may make 2 free Efforts when performing a Melee Attack.

traits.name: Large
traits.description: This model ignores up to 1 {STUN_ICON} Damage per attack suffered.

traits.name: Mastermind
traits.description: If this model is in play and not KO, its controlling player gains +1 to the Take the Lead roll.

traits.name: Strategist
traits.description: While this model is in play and not KO, you gain +1 Resource point.

traits.name: Venom Enrage
traits.description: When this model uses the Venom Dose trait the first 2 Damage markers received by this model during each round are ignored.

traits.name: Laser Sight {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target one model in line of sight. The target counts as being under the effect of Lights until the end of the round, or until the target moves or changes its current position.

traits.name: Leadership
traits.description: Other friendly models within 8" and LoS gains 1 Free Effort while Attacking and Defending.

traits.name: Light Armor
traits.description: Enemy models roll 1 less attack dice when targeting this model.

traits.name: Living Legend
traits.description: This model can be activated twice each round. Each activation is independent of the other (and cannot be made consecutively unless there is no other choice). If the model has an Audacity marker, it is only used for one of its activations. In addition, once per round, when a trait specifies this model as a target, you may cancel the use of that trait. A crew that includes a Living Legend loses one Pass on Activation each round (if applicable).

traits.name: Long Guns
traits.description: If this model is the Boss, then at the start of the first Raise the Plan phase you may select up to three friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} with ranged weapons with the Short Range and Firearm rules. Those weapons replace the Short Range rule with the Medium Range rule for the duration of the game.

traits.name: Lord of Business
traits.description: If this model is the Boss, its crew has an extra $500 in its Funding stash. In addition, when a friendly model plays the Valuable Commodities card, you may place an additional Loot marker in contact with another Suspect marker.

traits.name: Lord of the Sewers
traits.description: This model may deploy in contact with any Sewer marker. In addition, this model’s crew generates 1 extra Sewer marker. Once per game, this model can continue (or start) its Movement action when using a Sewer.

traits.name: Luck
traits.description: Once per round, this model may reroll any single die that it has rolled, for whatever reason.

traits.name: Lunatic Laugh {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of the round, enemy models within 8" and LoS roll 1 fewer die when making a Defense roll.

traits.name: Magic Tattoos
traits.description: This model is immune to the Steal and Fire Statuses.

traits.name: Make them perfect
traits.description: This model’s Attack actions gain the Push (4) Status, but the direction of the Push must be directly towards a friendly Professor Pyg model if he is in play.

traits.name: Martial Artist
traits.description: This model ignores the penalty for being Outnumbered in combat.

traits.name: Martial Expert
traits.description: This model causes a Critical on a Strength die natural result of 4, 5, or 6, not just 6 (if the result is not enough to trigger also a hit, this trait only causes the Critical effect).

traits.name: Master Criminal
traits.description: All friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} with the Criminal trait benefit from a +1 bonus to their attack dice rolls when making Attacks.

traits.name: Master Marksman
traits.description: This model can reroll failed attack dice rolls when performing Ranged Attacks.

traits.name: Master of Stealth
traits.description: When this model is under the effect of the Night rule, it can only be seen by enemies within 6” instead of the usual range. It is still subject to rules that aid detection, such as Lights, Total Vision, etc. When this model benefits from the Sneak Attack trait, it gains +1 to its attack dice rolls.

traits.name: Medium Armor
traits.description: Enemy models roll 2 less attack dice when targeting this model.

traits.name: Medic {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model may remove up to 2 damage markers from a friendly model in contact (not Vehicle) with at least 1 Damage marker of any kind. If this ability is used to recover a model that is yet to activate that round from KO, the opponent gains a Pass marker.

traits.name: Menace {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Enemy models must spend one additional Action (of its choice) to choose this model as the target of an Attack. This effect lasts until the end of the round.

traits.name: Mental Dominance {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Once per round, this model may target an enemy model within 4” and line of sight. That model must take a Willpower roll. If it fails, you can perform one Action with that model, out of sequence, temporarily treating it as though it was one of your own models. You may not perform any action that could cause Damage to the target model (such as Falling, or deliberately positioning an Explosive template so it is affected, etc).

traits.name: Mercenary
traits.description: You can only recruit this model in a League of Assassins crew if a model with Name: Bane is also included in the crew.

traits.name: Military Tradition {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Other friendly models with the Veteran trait within 8” can move up to 2” immediately.

traits.name: Millionaire
traits.description: This model’s crew gains an additional $400 Funding.

traits.name: Mind Blast {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a model (not a Vehicle) within 8” and line of sight. The target must pass a Willpower roll or receive {BLOOD_ICON}{BLOOD_ICON} damage.

traits.name: Mind Control {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose an enemy model (not a Vehicle) within 5” and line of sight. The target immediately suffers the Hypnotize Status.

traits.name: Mind Control Device {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose a Suspect marker within 8”. Target a model within 4” of that Suspect marker. That model immediately suffers the Hypnotize Status. Remove that marker.

traits.name: Mine {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Once per turn when this model places a Suspect it may be designated a Mine marker (it is still a Suspect). When a model moves within 2" of a Mine, immediately roll 1D6 and remove the Mine. On a result of 3+ that model suffers {BLOOD_ICON}{BLOOD_ICON}.

traits.name: Minion (X)
traits.description: This model can be hired up to X times in a crew, regardless of its Name.

traits.name: Mixed Combat Style {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: After this model performs an Attack action it can perform an extra Attack action (of a different type from the first) during the same activation.

traits.name: Mob {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a friendly model with the Mobster trait that is within the range of this model's Inspire trait. Immediately perform a Ranged Attack action or a 4" Move followed by a Melee Attack action with that model.

traits.name: Mobster
traits.description: When attacking an Outnumbered model in close combat, this model rolls an additional attack die.

traits.name: Monitoring Device {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of the round, this model gains Total Vision and its ranged weapons gain Remote Controlled.

traits.name: Moral Compass
traits.description: This model cannot attack KO models.

traits.name: Mortal Kiss {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: If this model successfully performs at least 3 hits against a model (not a Vehicle), remove the target model as Casualty.

traits.name: Multifire {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: When using a ranged weapon, this model gains +2 attack dice. The model cannot move in the same round that it uses this ability.

traits.name: Multitask
traits.description:
This model chooses one of the following options before the game begins:
• Explorer: Gain the Undercover trait and +2 basic move distance.
• Hacker: Gain +1 Willpower. Also gains the Computer Intrusion trait.
• Defender: Gain +2 Endurance. Also gains the Force Field trait.
• Fighter: Gains +1 Attack, +1 Defense and the Claws trait.

traits.name: Multiverse Teleportation Device
traits.description: This model may not be deployed as normal at the start of the game. Instead, at the start of the Raise the Plan phase of the second round, place this model anywhere on the board (but not inside a building or similar enclosed space).

traits.name: Narcotic Dose (Dose)
traits.description: A model may use a Narcotics Dose at any time during its activation. If it does so, the model gains the Desensitized trait until the end of the round.

traits.name: Natural Immunities
traits.description: This model cannot be affected by the Blind, Poison or Steal Statuses.

traits.name: Negative Speed Force
traits.description: While this model is in play, the Speed Force Pool maximum is reduced by 2.

traits.name: Night Vision
traits.description: This model ignores the Night rule.

traits.name: No Mercy!!!
traits.description: All friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} add the Bleed (1) Status to their Attacks.

traits.name: Non-Lethal Ammo
traits.description: When this model attacks non-Vehicle models with its ranged weapons, all {BLOOD_ICON} damage becomes {STUN_ICON} damage.

traits.name: Objectives? Puzzles everywhere!!!
traits.description: A crew that includes this model does not accomplish Objective cards following the normal rules. Instead, when a model that share an Affiliation with this model place a Suspect marker, you must roll 1D3. Place a Number Counter on top of that Suspect marker with an equal value as the roll. At the end of the round, you score Objective cards that shown the same VP value as the Number Counters on top of the friendly Suspect markers. Each Number Counter only accomplish 1 Objective card and then, is removed.

traits.name: Obsessive (Mental Disorder)
traits.description: If this model selects the same target for all of its Attacks in a single activation, it gains +1 to the Strength die roll.

traits.name: Obstinate
traits.description: This model have 1 free Effort when Attacking, Defending and when taking Willpower rolls even if it reaches its maximum effort limit.

traits.name: OCD (Mental Disorder)
traits.description: If this model selects the same target for all of its attacks in a single activation, it gains +1 to its attack dice rolls.

traits.name: One-Armed
traits.description: This model suffers a -1 penalty to its defense die rolls.

traits.name: One of the Boys
traits.description: This model benefits from the Boss’s Inspire rule exactly as if it held Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON}.

traits.name: One Shot Gun {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: One use only. Choose an enemy model within 8” and line of sight. Roll a Strength 2+ die with Damage {BLOOD_ICON}{BLOOD_ICON}{BLOOD_ICON}, and Bleed 3. This ability is considered a Ranged Attack with the Anti-Tank rule, so all rules, traits and abilities that relate to it are in effect (i.e. Line of Sight, Cover, and traits that affect Ranged Attacks).

traits.name: Order {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target another friendly model within line of sight. The chosen model can immediately place a Suspect marker.

traits.name: Outlaw Field Commander {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose another friendly model within 4” and line of sight. That model gains +2 {+ATT_ICON} or {+DEF_ICON}.

traits.name: Painful Empathy {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Transfer Damage markers from another friendly model within 8" and LoS to this model. If any Damage markers are moved in this way, this model gains +1 to its Attacks and Defense skills and +1 to its Strength rolls until the end of the round.

traits.name: Panda Costume
traits.description: This model must spend an Action (any type) to stand up. This model may do nothing else during that Action.

traits.name: Paranoid (Mental Disorder)
traits.description: If this model has at least 1 Damage marker on its character card, then during the Raise the Plan phase it gains a {+DEF_ICON}.

traits.name: Perfect Creations
traits.description: If a friendly Professor Pyg is removed from the game as a Casualty, all friendly Dollotrons are removed as well. Dollotrons never count towards Objective requirements for being made KO or becoming a Casualty. If a friendly Professor Pyg within 4” of this model and LoS is hit by an Attack (of any kind), this model can make an Effort to take the hit instead, and all the Statuses of that attack. Dollotrons can only be recruited in a crew that contains Professor Pyg.

traits.name: Persuasive {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: At the end of this model’s activation, nominate any enemy model in line of sight that is yet to activate this round. That model must be the next to activate. The opponent can’t use a Pass to ignore this rule. A model can use this trait once per round.

traits.name: Pickpocket
traits.description: Once per Round, if this model is in contact with an enemy model suffering KO, you may look at your opponent's Objective card hand and Discard 1 card from it.

traits.name: Planning the Move
traits.description: All other friendly models with the Gotham City Siren rule in this model’s crew gain the Primary Target trait until the end of the game.

traits.name: Plant
traits.description:
Each Plant recruited to your crew grants you one friendly Suspect marker that may be placed anywhere on the board at the end of the Draw & Mulligan Objective Cards step of the pre-game sequence. Plants are not deployed as usual – instead, during a friendly model’s activation, you may place one of your Plants in contact with a friendly Suspect and then remove that Suspect.  Always are considered an activable model and inside the gaming area.

• If a Plant gets Knocked Out, immediately remove it as a Casualty.
• A plant may receive an Audacity marker even if it is not in play.
• A Plant’s basic move distance cannot be increased by any means.
• Plants have a 4” ‘action zone’ radius. Within that radius, Plants are able to attack in Melee (no line of sight or contact is needed), and may perform the Manipulate action.
• Plants can only Manipulate to reveal Suspects. 
• Plants are immune to the Poison, Knocked Down, Hypnotize and Blind Statuses.
• When a Plant is removed as a Casualty, it can be placed in play again in a subsequent round with its usual rules, removing all Damage and Statuses suffered previously.

traits.name: Play Nice!
traits.description: All friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} in this model’s crew gain the Bluff trait.

traits.name: Plead {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose one enemy model (not a Vehicle) within 4” and line of sight. The target must pass a Willpower roll or be unable to attack this model this round.

traits.name: Poison Master
traits.description: Enemy models within 8" of this model add 1 additional dice and add all the 3 results together while performing a roll to resist the Poison Status. If the enemy models within range Effort to add an additional die to the roll, then they must roll 4D6 and then choose 3 of them.

traits.name: Pollution Hate
traits.description: This model cannot enter Sewers.

traits.name: Possessed
traits.description: When this model is the Boss you can recruit up to three models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} with any Affiliation (as long as they don’t have the Bot or Cybernetic traits). Their Affiliation is assumed to be the same as this model. However, models hired in this way lose -1 Willpower and gain the Self-Discipline trait if they do not have it already.

traits.name: Power Armor MKII
traits.description: This model is Immune to CRT. In addition, you can make Efforts to ignore up to 2 Damage markers received per Effort.

traits.name: Power Dampening {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of the round, all models while within 4” of this model cannot benefit from the Incorporeal and Invulnerability traits, cannot cast Spells and cannot benefit from Free Efforts.

traits.name: Precise Aim {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: If this model has not moved, when performing a Ranged Attack it gains +2 to its attack dice rolls. This model may not move after using Precise Aim.

traits.name: Primary Target
traits.description: During this models activation, you can treat 1 enemy Suspect as friendly.

traits.name: Protect Me!
traits.description: If this model is hit by an enemy attack (any type), you may make an Effort to nominate a friendly model within 4” and LoS (not a Vehicle) to take the attack instead. Resolve any Damage and/or Status against the nominated model.

traits.name: Psychiatrist {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of the round, while a friendly model with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} with a Mental Disorder trait stays within 8” and LoS of this model they gain +1 to their Attack and Defense skills (not cumulative)

traits.name: Psycho
traits.description: When this model takes a Willpower test, if applies a -2 modifier to the roll result.

traits.name: Psychologist
traits.description: When a model within 4” scores an Objective, that model suffers Enervating 1 or removes 1 {STUN_ICON} from its character card (your choice).

traits.name: Public Resources
traits.description: If this model is included in your crew, add $300 to the crew’s available Funding. In addition, you may place one additional Streetlamp and Sewer marker before the game starts.

traits.name: Puzzle Master
traits.description: When this model is going to place a Suspect by a Manipulate action, it can place 2 Suspect markers and can place them within 6” instead of in contact.

traits.name: Pyromania (Mental Disorder)
traits.description: If this model can see any model that suffers the Fire Status, this model gains a {+DEF_ICON}.

traits.name: Quiz Master
traits.description: After playing an Objective card during this model's activation, instead of drawing, you may search your Objective deck for any card, reveal it and place it in to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

traits.name: Radio
traits.description: This model is always treated as though it were within range of it's Boss's Inspire trait.

traits.name: Raised in the Sewers
traits.description: This model can deploy in contact with a Sewer marker instead of in its deployment zone.

traits.name: Ranged Master
traits.description:
This model gains a +1 bonus to its attack dice rolls when performing Ranged Attacks.
Note: This trait is also called Expert Marksman on some character cards.

traits.name: Rapid Fire {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: When making a Ranged Attack, this model gains +1 Attack die.

traits.name: Reanimated Owl
traits.description: This model removes 1 Damage marker (any type) during the first step of the Recount Phase. Before removing this model as a Casualty, the opponent may choose to place a friendly or enemy Suspect in contact with it.

traits.name: Reflexes
traits.description: When performing a Ranged Attack against this model, successful hits must be rerolled.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: During the Recount phase, if this model is not KO it can remove 1 additional Damage marker (any type).

traits.name: Regrets
traits.description: At the start of each of this model’s activations, it must pass a Willpower roll or be unable to make any Attacks or use Flaming Wave during this round. For each friendly model that is KO or removed as a Casualty so far this game, this model gets -1 to the roll.

traits.name: Repairman {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Remove 2 Damage marker from a target Vehicle in contact.

traits.name: Resilient
traits.description: This model can reroll failed Endurance rolls.

traits.name: Revenge {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: All friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} that attack an enemy model within 8” of this model gain one extra attack die this round.

traits.name: Ricochet {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: After this model scores any successful hits with a Ranged Attack, select another enemy model within 2” and line of sight of the target. Perform an extra Ranged Attack (without spending Ammo) against this second target with the same weapon, ignoring line of sight, effective range and cover.

traits.name: Riddler Bots
traits.description: When you hire a model with the trait ‘Can you solve this?/X’, this trait changes to Autorepair/X (X is the value of the ‘Can you solve this?’ trait) and Multitask.

traits.name: Roots {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model within 8” and line of sight. Perform an opposed Endurance roll against that model – if you succeed, the target suffers the Slow (4) Status.

traits.name: Runaway
traits.description: This model is immune to the Arrest trait.

traits.name: Safe hands
traits.description: This model is immune to the Steal Status.

traits.name: Sapper {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Place a friendly Suspect in contact. That Suspect marker is treated as a small obstacle that provides Cover to a model that stay in contact with it.

traits.name: Savage Fighter {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model gains +1 to its attack dice rolls and the Push (2) Status when performing a melee attack until the end of the round.

traits.name: Scheming (X)
traits.description: During the Raise the Plan phase, if this model is in play and not KO, you can move up to (X) Suspect markers 4”, ignoring the minimum range between Suspect markers.

traits.name: Scientific
traits.description: This model may roll one additional die when performing a Willpower Skill roll and then remove 1 of the dice rolled. When this model performs a Special action during its activation, it may perform an additional different Special action as an extra action.

traits.name: Searcher
traits.description: While this model is in play and not KO, the opponent’s Resource points are reduced by -1 (not cumulative).

traits.name: Self-Destruction {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Move the model 6" and then Center the Explosive template over this model. This is resolved as an Explosive Ranged Attack, rolling a Strength 2+ die for each affected model on a successful roll, the model receives {BLOOD_ICON}{STUN_ICON} Damage. remove all suspects under the Explosive Template Once this action is resolved, remove this model as a Casualty.

traits.name: Retractable Claws
traits.description: This model’s Unarmed Melee Attacks inflict {BLOOD_ICON}{STUN_ICON} Damage and have the Sharp weapon special rule.

traits.name: Self-Discipline
traits.description: This character cannot be controlled by an opponent (for example, by means of an ability that inflicts the Hypnotize Status).

traits.name: Sharpshooter
traits.description: Ranged Attacks made by this model ignore the Cover rule.

traits.name: Shockwave {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Enemy models within 4” of this model suffer the Slow (4) Status.

traits.name: Shooter
traits.description: When this model performs Ranged Attacks against targets within 8”, the target does not benefit from the Cover rule.

traits.name: Small
traits.description: This model gains +1 Defense against enemy Ranged Attacks.

traits.name: Smuggler
traits.description: When this model is recruited, its crew can buy Magazines and Radio equipment at half of the usual $ cost.

traits.name: Sneaking
traits.description: During the Recount phase, this model can move up to 4”, using the rules for Movement Actions.

traits.name: Soul Armor {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Remove up to 2 Damage markers (any type) from this model.

traits.name: Speed Force Absorption
traits.description: This model can steal 1 Speed Force marker from another model with the Speedster trait at the end of the Drain Speed Force subphase. This marker may cause the model to exceed the normal maximum reserve of Speed Force markers.

traits.name: Speed Force Master
traits.description:
This model can spend up to 2 Speed Power counters during the round like Action Counters.

This model can spend up to 2 Speed Power markers during its activation to gain up to 2 {+ATT_ICON} or {+DEF_ICON}.

traits.name: Stealth
traits.description: When this model is under the effect of the Night rule, it can only be seen by enemies within 8” instead of the usual range. It is still subject to rules that aid detection, such as Lights, Total Vision, etc.

traits.name: Steel Hands
traits.description: This model’s Unarmed Melee Attacks {STUN_ICON}{STUN_ICON}{STUN_ICON} inflict Damage with the Push (4) Status.

traits.name: Stop! {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model within 8” and line of sight (not a Vehicle). Perform an opposed Willpower roll against that model. If successful, reduce the target model’s Defense skill by 1 (this trait is not cumulative if used multiple times on the same model). In addition, the target suffers the Slow (4) Status. Both effects last until the end of the round.

traits.name: Street Guy
traits.description: When this model benefits from the Cover rule, it may force the attacker to reroll one successful hit.

traits.name: Stupid
traits.description: This model cannot perform Manipulate Actions, under any circumstances.

traits.name: Sturdy
traits.description: This model does not reduce its Effort Limit due to accumulated Damage.

traits.name: Subliminal Suggestion {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: A target friendly/enemy model with a Mental Disorder trait within 8” and LoS is Moved 4” (you cannot move it so that it Falls) or the targeted friendly model performs an Attack rolling 1 additional Attack die.

traits.name: Superior Sense of Smell
traits.description: This model may see any model within 10" and is immune to the Blind Status. When performing a Ranged Attack, you must be able to draw a straight and unobstructed line between this model and the target model.

traits.name: Super Jump {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Remove this model and immediately place it completely within 6”.

traits.name: Supernatural
traits.description: All attacks made by this model ignores the Invulnerability, Light Armor, Medium Armor and Tough Skin traits.

traits.name: Surgical madness (Mental disorder)
traits.description:
When this model uses the Medic trait, the target model removes 1 extra Damage marker (any type). In addition, roll 1D6. The target model gains the following trait until the end of its next activation:
Result       Trait
  1             Weak
  2             Stupid
  3             Aggressive Schizophrenia
  4             The Voices
  5             OCD
  6             Desensitized

traits.name: Survivor
traits.description: When this model is made a Casualty, do not remove it from play. Instead, roll a D6: on a result of 5+ the model removes 1 Injury marker {BLOOD_ICON} and remains in play. If the roll is failed, the model becomes a Casualty.

traits.name: Sustained Defense
traits.description: For every two successful defense rolls made by this model, cancel one extra enemy hit.

traits.name: Swift
traits.description: This model can make 1 Effort to improve its basic move distance by +2” for the remainder of the round.

traits.name: Tachyon device
traits.description: In the Drain Speed Force sub-phase, if there aren’t any Speed Force markers in the Speed Force pool, this model adds up to 2 Speed Force markers to its own reserve.

traits.name: Take Cover! {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose a friendly model with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} within 4” of this model (but not the activated model itself). That model gains 2 {+DEF_ICON}.

traits.name: Takedown
traits.description: When this model makes another model KO with an Attack, it may immediately make an Effort to make the target a Casualty.

traits.name: Taunt {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Choose one enemy model (not a Vehicle) within 8” and line of sight. Perform an opposed Willpower roll against that model. If it successful, then for the rest of the round increase the target’s Attacks skill by +1, but reduce its Defense skill by -2.

traits.name: Teamwork (X) (All)
traits.description: This model may roll (X) additional dice when performing Melee Attacks during its activation and when Defending while another model with the Teamwork trait is within 4”.

traits.name: Teamwork (X) (Model/Keyword)
traits.description: This model may roll (X) additional dice when performing Melee Attacks during its activation and when Defending while the (named/keyword) model is within 4”.

traits.name: Teen Titans Founder
traits.description: This model can be recruited in a Teen Titans Team, ignoring ‘The Sidekick’ trait. When operating as part of a Teen Titans crew, this model gains +1 Willpower, +1 Strength and the Reinforced Gloves trait.

traits.name: Tension
traits.description: This model gains +1 to its Attacks and Defense values while it has at least one {BLOOD_ICON} Damage marker on its Character Card.

traits.name: The Big Blue Boy Scout
traits.description: If an allied Bruce Wayne model receives any number of hits while within 4” of this model, this model may make an Effort - if it does so, resolve the hits against this model instead.

traits.name: The Boss
traits.description: If this model is the crew’s Boss, friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} gain the Expendable trait.

traits.name: The Dynamic Duo
traits.description: This model can activate immediately after a friendly Robin (Boy Wonder) model within 8”, interrupting the usual sequence of play.

traits.name: The Fear Master
traits.description: This model has 1 free Effort while Attacking for each Objective card in the Terror pile. In addition, if this model is going to be targeted by an Attack, you may discard (not triggering any effect) 1 card from your Terror pile to nominate a friendly model within 4” and LoS to be the new target of the Attack instead.

traits.name: The Holiday Killer
