traits.name: High Caliber
traits.description: This weapon’s Strength die is the last that must be removed from the attack if the target is within effective range.

traits.name: Duo (X)
traits.description: When this model is included in a crew that also contains the model names in parentheses that share a Rank with this model, one of them ignores the shared Rank for the purposes of crew configuration.

traits.name: Small Caliber
traits.description: This weapon loses 2 dice instead of 1 if the target is not in effective range.

traits.name: Rapid Reload {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model count as having Reloaded its weapons with Reload.

traits.name: Conundrum Champion {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a model within 8” and line of sight. Perform an opposed Willpower roll against the target. If successful the target suffers the Enervating (2) Status.

traits.name: Meow
traits.description:
When this model places a Suspect, it may also be a Cat marker (you may have up to 3 in play at once). When this model starts its activation, it may be placed in contact with a friendly Cat marker, before removing that marker. During this model’s activation, you may remove a friendly Cat marker to reveal an enemy Suspect within 8” of that marker. 

If this model is removed as a Casualty or suffers KO during an enemy model’s activation, you may place this model in contact with a friendly Cat marker, and ignore the Attack/Status. Then, remove that Cat marker.

traits.name: Stealthy Cats {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Move each friendly Cat marker in play up to 4”. For each marker that ends this movement within 4” of this model, this model may move up to 2” for free.

traits.name: The Crew {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: All friendly models with this model’s Affiliation within 8” and in LoS with this model gain {MOV+2_ICON} Marker.

traits.name: Shadowed Perch
traits.description:
Spend this model's Movement Action to place this model within 4” of a friendly Owl marker.
This model's basic move distance cannot be increased by any means.

traits.name: Dots Suit
traits.description: This model can move in any direction (including vertically) over obstacles and Difficult Ground without extra cost or penalty. In addition, when a friendly model within 8” and LoS becomes the target of an attack, this model may perform Efforts, to remove dice from that attack. This model cannot buy any equipment.

traits.name: Protect the Shadows
traits.description: When an enemy model performs a Reveal action on a friendly Suspect within 8” and LoS, this model may make an Effort to cancel that action.

traits.name: Configurable Weapon
traits.description: This model can only use one of its Weapons, choose it during your first Raise the Plan phase. This model can perform an effort and spend a Special Action during its activation to change the selected weapon to the other.

traits.name: It’s Mine
traits.description: Enemy models cannot Reveal your Suspect markers while the marker is within 2” of this model.

traits.name: Master Torturer
traits.description: If this model is not suffering KO, enemy models within 6” suffer -1 to its Willpower value when performing Willpower rolls. In addition, when a friendly model within 6” would perform a Melee Attack action and removes an enemy model as a Casualty or inflicts KO as a result, you may choose not to remove the targeted model from play or inflict KO. The opponent immediately removes up to 3 damage markers. Then you may move 1 player marker 6”.

traits.name: Frightening Reputation
traits.description: If this model is not KO, when targeting or targeted by a model with the Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON}, this model gains +1 Attack and Defense.

traits.name: Don't Mind Me
traits.description: This model receives the same free Efforts when defending as its Effort Limit until it makes an Attack action.

traits.name: Only 20% of Taxes! {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a model within 8" and LoS. Make an opposed Willpower roll, if successful, choose 1 of the target's traits. Until this model makes this trait again, or is removed from the game, that model cannot benefit from that trait.

traits.name: Shadowed Nightmare
traits.description: Instead of deploying this model normally you may keep it off the table. It may receive an Audacity marker even if it is not in play. When a Suspect is placed, then you may place this model within 8” of that suspect and all models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} within 6” suffer Enervating 1.

traits.name: Bionic Eye
traits.description: This model ignores the Night rule, and may spend a Special Action while making a Ranged Attack to gain a +1 to Hit.

traits.name: Lieutenant (X)
traits.description: If the crew contain a model with Alias (X),  this model reduces its funding cost to 0 and all friendly models with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} that start their activation within 8” of this model are affected by the Inspire trait of the friendly model with Alias: (X).

traits.name: Coordination  {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target another friendly model within 8” of this model that share a keyword with this model, then, immediately perform an action with that model.

traits.name: Incorruptible
traits.description: This model can only be included into a Crew with a Boss that have its same affiliation.

traits.name: Observation
traits.description: While this model is not activated this round, it gains +1 to its Defense rolls, while making an attack against an activated model this round, it gains +1 to Hit and Strength dice rolls.

traits.name: Quilt's Helmet
traits.description: This model can see any model within 8” of it, ignoring any other rule and scenery and ignores the Blind effect. In addition, this model may spend its Special Action to target an enemy model within 6”, that model suffers the Hypnotize Status. This model may only purchase up to 1 Equipment.

traits.name: Computer Intrusion  {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model may choose up to 2 Suspect markers within 8” and move them up to 2”.

traits.name: Expendable Penguin X
traits.description: This model not count towards any Pass markers for any reason. It does not activate as normal and can not recieve an Audacity marker. This model can only be hired in a crew if there are a model with the Penguin Caller and/or Hidden Penguins trait on it. When this model is removed as a Casualty, it can be placed in play again in a subsequent round with the Penguin Caller trait, removing all Damage and Statuses suffered previously.

traits.name: Vigilante’s Work
traits.description: During its activation, this model may take up to 1 Effort to perform an extra Manipulate action.

traits.name: Bat Beacon {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a Suspect within 6”. Place an Explosive Template centered over it and roll 2D6. All affected models with a Willpower value less than the result suffer Scared and Push (2) Statuses. If this model is affected, it may be placed anywhere within 4” of its current position. This model ignores the Statuses caused by this trait. However, this model may not use this trait in two consecutive activations.

traits.name: Shadows Agent
traits.description: If this model is the Boss, before the start of the game, choose another friendly model to be the Boss instead.

traits.name: Brawler
traits.description: For each Succesfull hit this model receives, place a {+DEF_ICON} on it.

traits.name: Provoke {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model within LoS and make an Opposed Willpower roll against it. If successful, that model can only target this model with it's Attack actions until this model is removed as a Casualty or this model uses this trait again.

traits.name: The Emperor
traits.description: This model starts the game with 6 Business counters but can only gains Business counters when a friendly model suffers KO or removed as a Casualty.

traits.name: Fight Me!
traits.description: If a friendly model within 4” of this model and LoS suffers any number of hits from an Attack (of any kind), this model may make an Effort to take the hits instead, and all the Statuses of that attack. Only one Effort {STUN_ICON} is required per enemy Attack.

traits.name: Energy Absorption {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: All the damage inflicted by this model melee attacks this round, inflicts {BLOOD_ICON} instead of {STUN_ICON}. In addition, per each successfull non-blocked hit, this model removes 1 damage.

traits.name: Hypnotic Radio Waves {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description:
Choose an enemy model with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} (not with Rank {RANK_VEHICLE_ICON}) within 5” and line of sight. 
The target immediately suffers the Hypnotize Status.

traits.name: Always Illuminated
traits.description: This model is considered Illuminated.

traits.name: Explosive Sense
traits.description: All friendly models whitin 6" of this model, that are going to be affected by a Explosive template, impose a -1 to that roll, if any.

traits.name: In The End
traits.description: Once per model Activation, while this model is in the gaming area, you may spend (X) Business Counters to gain 1 of the following bonuses: • (1) Flip face up a face down Underworld King card immediately. • (2) At the start of a friendly model activation, move up to 4" a friendly model with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} within the Inspire range. • (X+2) Add X additional dice to a friendly model with Rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} within Inspire range that is going to perform a Melee Attack roll or Defense roll, declare it before the Efforts are declared.

traits.name: Criminal Empire
traits.description: When both players end the placing of the Sewer markers, each player must place 1 Criminal Empire marker (use an Event marker) at least 8" away of all Deployment Zones. Each time a friendly model makes a Manipulate action within 4" of a Criminal Empire marker, you earn 1 Business Counter.

traits.name: Hold 'em Still
traits.description: When targeting an Outnumbered model, you gain +1 to hit and Bleed 2.

traits.name: Electromatic Control Device {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Place an Event marker within 4". You can place within 4" enemy models that are within 4" of that marker when is placed. In addition, all enemy models that stays within 4" of that marker during its activation, suffers Enervating 2. Remove the marker at the start of Recount phase

traits.name: Limited Equipment
traits.description: This model can only purchase up to 1 Equipment.

traits.name: True Psychopath
traits.description: When an model within 8” is removed as a Casualty, you may place 2 {OBJECTIVE_CROSS_ICON} on top of the Psychopaths Objective card instead of 1.

traits.name: Hunter
traits.description: When this model is going to make an Attack action against a model that is already activated this round, it may perform a free Special Action before or after resolving the attack.

traits.name: The Quiver
traits.description:
When this model starts its activation, choose one of the following effects. You may not choose the same option more than once.
•1: Add to this round Ranged Attack Stunned.
•2: Add to this round Ranged Attacks Knocked Down + Blunt 2.
•3: Add to this round Ranged Attacks +2 RoF.
•4: Until the end of the round, this model gains the Grapple Gun rule.

traits.name: Reverberation
traits.description: This model may take an Effort during a Canary Cry trait, to inflict the Push (4) Status in any models affected by it.

traits.name: Alpha
traits.description: This model's Attack and Defense cannot be reduced by any means.

traits.name: Grudge Match {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: When this model declares an Attack action you may choose that no efforts may be made.

traits.name: Like Flies to Me
traits.description: When this model is the target of an Attack action, the attacker must treat this model's Defense value as equal to the attacker's Strength value.

traits.name: Breaking the Bat
traits.description: When Targeting the Enemy Boss this model Crts on a 3+. After resolving the attack action (but before removing the target) place the target Boss 4", if the target ends in contact with a Suspect, remove the Suspect from play.

traits.name: Accelerated Venom
traits.description: When this model spends a Venom dose, instead of receiving the normal effects it may instead choose one of the following effects: • When this model performs a Movement action, you may place any model it came in contact with at any point 2" away. • {STUN_ICON} damage this model deals this activation is converted to {BLOOD_ICON} damage.

traits.name: A Bit of Magic
traits.description: This model may assign Magic Counters to itself when performing Actions. If there is a Magical Conflux remove all the Magic Counters from this model, and this model takes just 1 Damage.

traits.name: Vampire
traits.description:
Enemy models roll 1 fewer attack die when targeting this model and when this model inflicts {BLOOD_ICON} with a Melee attack, remove 1 Damage marker.
In addition, at the start of this model's activation, if is it not within the area effect of a Light source it may remove 1 Damage marker.

traits.name: Vampire Reign
traits.description: Enemy models within 8" suffer -1 to it's attack and defense dice rolls and may not use the Dodging rule.

traits.name: Leading from the Shadows
traits.description: If this model is the crew Boss, while this model is not on the gaming area (and not removed as a Casualty), its Inspire rule affects all the gaming area.

traits.name: Cryo-Grenade {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Place an Explosive template completely within 8". All models affected without the Cold Acclimation trait suffer Cold rule and any Suspects affected become Frozen.

traits.name: Exposure
traits.description: For each additional successful hit after the first, the target suffers 1 additional damage marker (any type).

traits.name: Cryo-Armor (X)
traits.description: Enemy models roll X fewer attack dice when targeting this model. In addition, while this model is within 4" of a Frozen Suspect, it gains X Free Effort when Defending.  This model counts as having the Rank {RANK_VEHICLE_ICON} for traits that removes Damage from it.

traits.name: Cold Acclimation
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Ice Queen
traits.description:
Friendly models with affiliation {AFF_MRFREEZE_ICON} gain 1 free Effort while they are within 4" of a Frozen Suspect and/or this model.
In addition, once per round as a free action, you may target a Suspect within 4". That Suspect becomes a Frozen Suspect.

traits.name: Cryo-Weapon
traits.description:
When an attack or weapon that uses this rule score at least 1 Successful hit, choose another model and 1 Suspect within 2" of the target.
The chosen model suffers 1 hit from that weapon (doesn't trigger the Cryo-Weapon rule) and and the Suspect becomes Frozen.

traits.name: Barrage {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: During this round, you can target any model with a Ranged Attack ignoring LoS and Cover, but then suffers a -1 Attack die and -1 to hit for that roll.

traits.name: Drop It! {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model within 8" and LoS and make an opposed Willpower roll against it. If successful, that model places a new friendly Suspect in contact ignoring the usual placement rules.

traits.name: Cryo-Charge {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: The next Attack action performed this activation gains CRT: Freeze.

traits.name: Legendary Solo
traits.description:
Friendly models within this model's Inspire range gain 1 free Effort.
Enemy models within this model's Inspire range must make an Effort or cannot benefit from the Inspire trait.

traits.name: Changing the Tempo {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description:
Choose one of the following:
-This model's Inspire range is increased by 4".
-Friendly models within this model's Inspire range gain 1 free Effort.

This effect lasts until this trait is used again.

traits.name: Batcave Support {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a friendly model within 8" and LoS without the Cop trait. That model gains X+1 {+ATT_ICON} or X+1 {+DEF_ICON}, where X is the number of friendly Suspects within 4" of this model.

traits.name: Bloody Christmas {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Before removing an enemy model as a Casualty by this model's actions, place a new friendly Suspect (if able) in contact with that model. That Suspect is also a Blood Present marker.

traits.name: Bounty Hunter
traits.description: When this model reveal an enemy Suspect, it may perform a free Attack Action.

traits.name: Find the Better Joker
traits.description: When a target enemy model would be removed as a Casualty within 8” of this model, you may place a new friendly model with the Alias; Joker's Victim X that has been already removed as a Casualty, in contact with the target before removing it.

traits.name: Three Jokers
traits.description:
When you recruit this model you must also recruit any other models that share this trait. Models with this trait treat their rank as {RANK_LEADER_ICON} in game.
In addition, this model can take Audacity with the Trickster trait from a friendly model with this trait that is already activated this round, counting as taking Audacity from a non-activated model.

traits.name: Poisoned Fish {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a Poisoned Fish marker. Choose a direction and roll 2D6. Move that marker a number of inches equal to the result. Any model the marker comes in contact with that has an Endurance value less than the roll suffers the Poison Status.

traits.name: Explosive Teeths {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Move an Explosive Teeth marker up to 4". Then reduce its number counter by 1

traits.name: I am Chaos {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Discard an Objective card at random. The opponent must show you their Objective card hand. For each enemy model within 8" and LoS, choose one of those cards – the opponent must Discard it

traits.name: Mindless Monster
traits.description: At the start of this model's activation target the closest enemy model. If the first action this model performs is a Movement action and it ends in contact with that enemy model, perform a free Attack action against that model.

traits.name: Faint
traits.description: When this model becomes KO, it is also removed as a Casualty.

traits.name: Protector (X)
traits.description: While the friendly model with that Name/Alias is within 4" of this model, you can choose this model at the target of any attack originally targeting that model.

traits.name: Charismatic Rat
traits.description:
All friendly models with Swarm within 8" and LoS, gains 1 free Effort.
In addition, during this model’s activation, if you have less than 3 Sewer Swarms in play, you may make 1 Effort to place 1 Sewer Swarm model within 2” of this model, then, the opponent gains 1 Pass marker.

traits.name: Brain Enhancers
traits.description: When this model reveals or place a Suspect, you may draw 1 Objective card.

traits.name: Tamer Device {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model within 8", mode all friendly Sewer Swarm models 6" towards that model. Make an attack with 1 of those models against the target if able, with +1 Attack dice for each another Sewer Swarm in contact with the target.

traits.name: Justice
traits.description: When a friendly model is removed as a casualty, an enemy model suffers the Quarry (1) Status.

traits.name: Required (X)
traits.description: This model can only be included in a crew that already contains the model with alias (X).

traits.name: Interdimensional Virus
traits.description: At the start of this models activation roll a D6. On a 1-4 this model gains a free Ranged Attack action. If this action is not used suffer {BLOOD_ICON}{STUN_ICON}

traits.name: Releasing the Dots {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Reveal an enemy Suspect within 8" and LoS.

traits.name: Detachable Arms
traits.description: This model may place or reveal a Suspect marker within 8” and LoS instead of in contact.

traits.name: War Scream {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: All models within 8" and LoS with less Willpower than this model suffers Scared.

traits.name: Detective Best Friend
traits.description: While this model is within 8" and LoS of a friendly model with the Detective trait, it can count as being in the position of that model when making a Manipulate Action.

traits.name: I'm a Symbol {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target another friendly model without the Cop trait in Line of Sight. That model moves 4" and may immediately place a Suspect.

traits.name: Bloodlust
traits.description: When this model causes a KO or Casualty, you may place 2 {OBJECTIVE_CROSS_ICON} on top of the Psychopaths Objective card instead of 1.

traits.name: Investigator
traits.description: This model places an additional Counter when Revealing an enemy Suspect for the purpose of Objective cards.

traits.name: Embrace the Chaos
traits.description: After an attack in which this model scores any hits, you may take the top card card from your objective deck. Immediately use the resource on that card for free and then discard it.

traits.name: He Was the Best of Us
traits.description: Enemy models within 6” and LoS cannot make Reveal actions.

traits.name: Pull (X)
traits.description: The affected model is moved directly towards to the attacker X”.

traits.name: Bank Robber
traits.description: This model may Reveal Suspects within 3" instead of in contact.

traits.name: If You're Good at Something
traits.description: The Explosive Teeth markers inflicts an additional {STUN_ICON} marker. In addition, when this model places a Suspect, you may place it within within 6” instead of in contact.

traits.name: Tough Guy
traits.description: This model counts as two models for scoring friendly Objective cards.

traits.name: Protecting the Investment {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Place a Suspect within 3" and LoS. Target an enemy model within 8" and LoS to that Suspect, move 4" the target.

traits.name: Limited Attack
traits.description: An attack with this weapon inflicts its damage only once, regardless of the number of successful hits and does not inflict Knocked Down when scoring a CRT

traits.name: Shadows Command {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target another friendly model within 8", place it in contact with a friendly Suspect. Then remove that Suspect. That model may immediately perform an Attack action. If this attack is a Melee attack, it may target an enemy up to 4" away and in LoS..

traits.name: Serum Injection (X) {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Once per game, this model gains X free efforts to Attack and Defense rolls and ignores any modifiers to the Effort limit until the end of the round.

traits.name: I'm Vengeance
traits.description:
Vengeance: When this model makes an Effort during an Attack action it adds an addition Attack die.
Once you have scored 8 Objective cards this model loses Vengeance and gains Hope.
Hope: All friendly {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} that start their activation within 8” of this model are treated as though it were within range of the Inspire trait.

traits.name: Ballistic Bat-Armor
traits.description: Enemy models do not roll a Strength die when attacking this model. In addition, ranged attacks targeting this model roll 1 fewer die.

traits.name: Support (X) {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a friendly model with Alias: X within 8" and LoS. Immediately perform an action with that model.

traits.name: Crucial Information {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model may move a Suspect within 8" and LoS 4".

traits.name: Bat-Lenses
traits.description: When this model or a friendly model with Alias: Batman (Robert Pattinson) reveals an enemy Suspect, you may look at your opponent's Objective hand.

traits.name: Disguise {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Remove a friendly Suspect within 4". Then move this model 4". Treat this model as if it had not spent an Attack action for the purpose of any traits.

traits.name: This is My City {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description:
Target an enemy model that that has LoS to a friendly Suspect within 8" of it. That model suffers the Hypnotize Status.
If that model is a {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} without the Incorruptible trait, before the Willpower roll is made you may spend $100 Black Money to have it automatically fail.

traits.name: Pulling the Strings
traits.description: When this model places a Suspect, target another friendly model and move it 8".

traits.name: Inside Man
traits.description: During this model's activation you may play the Objective: Pinched Mobster as if this model had taken damage from an attack. Instead of placing the Event in contact with this model, place it in contact with an enemy model within 8" and LoS.

traits.name: Widespread Corruption {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy Suspect within 8" and LoS. Place a friendly Suspect in contact and remove the enemy Suspect.

traits.name: Showing the Ropes
traits.description: If this model is the target for the Objective: Recovering the Juice, target another friendly model within 6" with rank {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} to also count as the target model.

traits.name: Shady Dealings {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Discard two objective cards from your hand.

traits.name: Hitman {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: During this model's activation, you may play the Objective: The Program, targeting an enemy model within 8" as if it had Revealed a Suspect.

traits.name: Reveal the Bat {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: If this model has revealed an enemy Suspect this activation, place a new friendly model with Alias: Batman (Robert Pattinson) in contact and remove this model from the game. Transfer all Damage, Statuses, Audacity, and any Objectives that had targeted this model to the new model. If there were any unspent actions remaining, continue this activation using the new model. No Objectives may be scored as a result of this trait.  *This model counts as Alias: Batman (Robert Pattinson)  {RANK_LEADER_ICON} for the purpose of forming your Objective deck.

traits.name: Tactical Intervention
traits.description: When this model inflicts damage, draw the top 3 cards of your objective deck. Reveal 1  {OT_PROTECTION_ICON} type card and add it to your hand. Place the rest either on top or bottom of your Objective deck in any order.

traits.name: Inspiring Presence (X)
traits.description: When this model is within 8" of a model with Alias: (X) is treated as though it were within range of it's Boss's Inspire trait.

traits.name: Poisoned Signs {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Remove the Poison Status from a model within 6" and LoS. Look at the 3 first Objective cards from your deck, choose 1 and add it to your hand and discard the others. If you had removed at least Poison (3) or higher, return those cards to the top of the deck in any order instead of discarding them.

traits.name: Suit of Sorrows
traits.description: When Attacking or Defending, this model gains 1 free Effort and reduces the total number of Damage markers it receives from attacks by 1.

traits.name: God's Work
traits.description:
During the Raise the Plan phase, target an enemy model. Attacks this model performs against the targeted model gain +1 to the Attack dice roll. If this model removes a targeted model as a Casualty, it gains a free Manipulate action for the rest of the game.
This model can only perform an Attack using a weapon that causes {BLOOD_ICON} against models that have been targeted by this trait.

traits.name: God's Banner {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description:
Choose one of the following: • All models with the Saint Dumas Zealot keyword within 8" remove 2 {STUN_ICON} Damage. • Discard X Objective cards (where X is equal to the number of models with the Saint Dumas Zealot trait within 8").
This model may spend a Manipulate action to activate this Special.

traits.name: Saint Dumas Zealot
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Cleaning the Scene
traits.description: When a friendly model within 6" removes an enemy model as a casualty it may immediately perform a Manipulate action or draw 1 Objective card.

traits.name: Motion (X)
traits.description: When using this weapon, if any hits are scored the wielder may immediately Move X".

traits.name: Recoil (X)
traits.description: When using this weapon, after resolving the attack, the wielder immediately Moves X" directly away from the target or template position.

traits.name: Dispersion {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: During this activation, when an attack places an Explosive template, place the narrow end of a Spray template in contact with the Explosive template. Both templates affect models as usual.

traits.name: Stalker
traits.description: When activating a trait that targets an enemy model, this model may treat its position as that of a friendly Suspect within 8".

traits.name: Harlequin
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Harlequin Show {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Discard a card from your hand. Depending on the discarded card type, another friendly model within 8" with the Harlequin trait gains: • {OT_CONTROL_ICON} Give to it an audacity marker from a friendly model that is already activated (with the unactivated side). • {OT_MENACE_ICON} Place it in contact with an enemy model within its Movement value. • {OT_VIOLENCE_ICON} Immediately make an Attack with it. • {OT_PROTECTION_ICON} Remove 2 Damage.

traits.name: Concealed
traits.description: To use this weapon, you first need to perform 2 Efforts.

traits.name: Counter Argument {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description:
This trait’s effect depends on which side of the Coin is in play:
-	Good Side: If this model performs an Attack action against a model with Audacity, this model gains an extra Manipulate action.
-	Scarred Side: If this model performs a Manipulate while within 4” of an enemy model with Audacity, this model gains an extra Attack action.

traits.name: A Lot Colder
traits.description:
This model gains the following bonuses based on the amount of Ice Age cards not in your Ice Age pile:
1- Can choose to ignore the penalty for move before attacking, but instead suffer a -1 penalty to its Ranged attack dice rolls.
2- +2 Attack.
3- +1 Defense.
4- +2 Strength dice rolls.
(Bonuses stay in effect as the number increases and will be removed as the number decreases.)
When a model with this trait is recruited in your crew, you cannot include the Searching for Nora card in your Objective deck.

traits.name: Snow Storm {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Center the Explosive template on this model. Roll a Strength 3+ die against all other models affected by the template with Damage {STUN_ICON}{STUN_ICON}. Any Suspects affected become Frozen.

traits.name: Cryo-Reinforcement {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a friendly Frozen Suspect and another friendly model with the Cryo-Armor (1) trait within 4". Remove that Suspect. Until this model is removed from play or uses this trait again, the target model's Cryo Armor (1) trait increases by 1 and its Ranged weapons with S. Range lose it.

traits.name: Groundwork {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Reveal cards from the top of your Objective deck until you reveal a {OT_CONTROL_ICON} type card and add it to your hand. Discard any other cards revealed this way. If a friendly model with the Detective trait has Revealed a Suspect this round, instead of revealing, search your Objective deck for a {OT_CONTROL_ICON} type card and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your Objective deck.

traits.name: A Real Change
traits.description: Once per round, during this model's activation you may look at the opponent's Objective hand, then the opponent may target one of their models and preform an immediate Manipulate action with that model.

traits.name: Unmask the Truth
traits.description: When this model Reveals an enemy Suspect, enemy models with the Intel Support trait receive an additional Disruption token.

traits.name: No More Lies
traits.description: During the activation of a friendly model with the Riddler Followers keyword, you may remove a friendly Suspect within 4" of that model. If you do, during this and the subsequent activation, the opponent cannot play Objectives as Resources.

traits.name: Not Him
traits.description: When this model suffers Damage that causes it to suffer KO or be removed as a Casualty, you may place it in contact with a friendly model within 8" that share a Keyword with this model. The friendly model suffers that damage instead.

traits.name: Riddler Followers
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Harley's Best Friends
traits.description: When starting this model's activation within 8" of a friendly model with Name: Dr. Harleen Frances Quinzel, this model ignores the Stupid trait and may make an extra Tactical Action but cannot benefit from the Inspire rule.

traits.name: Suspicius Plant
traits.description: This model may place Suspects ignoring the Plant trait restriction.

traits.name: Mindless Gas Attack
traits.description: At the start of this model's activation target the closest enemy model. If the first action this model performs is a Movement action and it ends within X" of that enemy model, perform a free Attack action against that model.

traits.name: Computer Console
traits.description: This model cannot be attacked more than once by the same model.

traits.name: Visor Projections
traits.description:
At the start of this model's activation, choose one of the following to apply to this model's weapons.
- Gains the Handy trait.
- Gains the Reach (8) trait.
- Change the damage type of the weapon to {BLOOD_ICON}.

traits.name: Feedback Protection
traits.description: This model doesn't receives Disruption tokens when a Suspect is removed by the Riddle marker rule.

traits.name: Clay Body
traits.description: This model may choose to convert {BLOOD_ICON} markers to {STUN_ICON} markers or vice versa from all the Ranged Attacks affecting it, unless the attack had the Cold and/or Freeze Statuses and/or Electric rule. In addition, this model starts the game with 3 Clay markers (they are also friendly Suspect markers), when you deploy this model, deploy them completely within 8" of it. When this model places a Suspect marker, and there are less than 3 Clay markers in play, that marker is also a Clay marker. When this model is moved/placed, you can Move 4" 1 Clay marker in play. If there are less than 3 Clay markers already in play, this model gains a free Manipulate action that can only be used to place a Suspect.

traits.name: Clay Slide {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Place an Event marker in contact with this model. Then place this model in contact with a target friendly Clay marker. Finally, place the targeted Clay marker in contact with the Event marker placed by this trait and remove the Event marker.

traits.name: Reform
traits.description: When this model is going to be removed as a Casualty/becoming KO, you must place this model in contact with a friendly Clay marker in play (if any) and then remove 3 damage markers from this model and remove that Clay marker.

traits.name: Inertia
traits.description: Until the end of the round in which this model had performed a Movement action, it adds +2 to the Strength rolls and may reroll it.

traits.name: Junk Hoarder  {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Discard a card. Depending on the type of the card: • {OT_CONTROL_ICON}: Place a Suspect within 4". • {OT_MENACE_ICON}: Move 4" a friendly model within 4". • {OT_VIOLENCE_ICON}: A friendly model within 4" gains 2 {+ATT_ICON}. • {OT_PROTECTION_ICON}: A friendly model within 4" gains 2 {+DEF_ICON}.

traits.name: Go My Little Birds {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Remove a friendly Suspect within 4". Place a friendly Suspect within 8". A friendly model within 4" of the Suspect moves 4".

traits.name: Served Well {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Remove target friendly model within 4" as a Casualty.

traits.name: Punishment
traits.description: Any target of this model's attacks cannot perform Efforts if they have the Quarry (X) Status.

traits.name: Terrible Revelation
traits.description: Enemy models within 8" of this model add 1 additional dice and add all the 3 results together while taking a Willpower roll produced by a model with Affiliation: {AFF_CULTS_ICON}. If the enemy models within range Effort to add an additional die to the Willpower roll, then they must roll 4D6 and then choose 3 of them.

traits.name: Righteous Vengeance {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Place a friendly model with alias Underworlder X that was previously removed from the game as Casualty within 8" of this model and within 4" of a Sewer marker or the Totem marker without any damage on it. That model immediately performs a Melee attack, and may make 2 free Efforts (it may not make any other Efforts during that action). If an enemy is not removed as a Casualty nor becomes KO by the result of that attack, that model is removed as a Casualty again.

traits.name: Blackfire Cultist
traits.description: When this model is removed as a Casualty, add 1 Faith to your pool.

traits.name: Undercity Knowledge
traits.description: Before both groups of both crews are selected, target up to 3 friendly models with Name: Unknown. When both groups are deployed (including any other rule like Hidden), the targeted models may be deployed within 4" of a Sewer marker. If both sides have this rule, start with the player with setup initiative.

traits.name: Undercity Command {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target friendly model within 8" of this model, and within 4" of a Sewer marker, follow the rules of using that Sewer marker immediately, but it can be moved later in the round during its activation (ignoring the Sewer penalty).

traits.name: Aggresive Preach
traits.description: When this model places a Suspect, the opponent shows the first card from their Objective deck and discards it. If the type is *PROTECTION* or *CONTROL* a target within 8" suffers the Hypnotize Status. If the type is *VIOLENCE* or *MENACE* a target within 8" suffers the Enervating (3) Status.

traits.name: The Good Command
traits.description: When you score an Objective card, an enemy model within 4" of a Sewer marker suffers the Quarry (X) Status (where X is the VP of the scored card). If you inflict this effect against another model by the use of this trait, the previous model loses the Quarry (X) Status.

traits.name: Exalt {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target up to 2 other friendly models with the Blackfire Cultist trait within this model's Inspire range. These models move 8". You may then discard a {OT_VIOLENCE_ICON} type card to immediately perform a Melee Attack with any of the target models.

traits.name: Martyrdom
traits.description: Every time a friendly model is removed from the game, place a {BLOOD_ICON} marker where you can see it. When this model is going to be removed as a Casualty, you can look at the first X cards from your deck, score immediately 1 of them. Shuffle the deck. This model does not suffer {STUN_ICON} during the Recount phase for the Faith rule and the Faith counters are not removed, instead it suffers X {BLOOD_ICON} - the number of Faith counters already in play (X is equal to the double the Round number).

traits.name: Quarry (X)
traits.description: Status. When a friendly model attacks this model, it receives +1 to hit against it. Then reduce the X by 1.

traits.name: Blackfire Totem
traits.description: At the start of the game, place the Blackfire Totem marker within 4" of a Sewer marker. When you gain Faith points, you may place it on this marker instead of into your pool (up to 5 Faith points at the same time). When a model within 8" and LoS to this marker is going to throw dice for a Melee Attack, Defense roll or Willpower roll, you may add X dice to that roll (where X is the number of Faith you remove from this marker). Decide it before rolling, but after the Efforts are made.

traits.name: Recover the Titan
traits.description: Once per round, when an enemy model places a Suspect, nominate it as a Titan Container marker until the end of the round. It is still a Suspect. Reveal 2 Objective cards from your hand and the opponent chooses one for you to play face down. During the Recount phase, if there are more friendly models than enemy models within 4 of the Titan Container, or the opponent had removed it, score that face down card. If not, discard it.

traits.name: Titan Addict
traits.description:
When this model uses a Titan Dose, ignore up to 2 Damage markers per source of damage until the end of the round. If this model receives 3 {BLOOD_ICON} damage while using a Titan Dose, the benefits of the Titan Dose ceases to apply.
In addition, this model may use more than one Titan Dose in the game.

traits.name: Savage Throw {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a Marker within 2". Place it in contact with an enemy model within 8" and LoS. Roll a Strength die against it counting as a Ranged Attack. On a success, the target model suffers {STUN_ICON}{STUN_ICON}.

traits.name: Controlled by Drugs
traits.description: This model can only be assigned an Audacity marker, make Efforts when performing an Attack action, and use traits requiring Effort, if there is another friendly model with the Fervent Follower trait or/and with the Rank: {RANK_LEADER_ICON} within 4". If a friendly model removes an enemy model as a Casualty within 4", that model suffers {STUN_ICON}{STUN_ICON}. Once per round, a friendly model with the Rank: {RANK_LEADER_ICON} or Fervent Follower trait may spend a Special action to move this model 4". This model may then immediately perform a Tactical action.

traits.name: I See the Light {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Search your Objective deck for an Objective card named I See. Reveal it and add it to your hand.

traits.name: The One and Only Joker
traits.description: At the start of this model's activation, if there are no enemy models within 4" you may search your Objective deck for an Objective card named Let Them In On The Joke. Reveal it and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Objective deck.

traits.name: Brainwash
traits.description: When this model places a Suspect, target an enemy model within 4" of that Suspect. Choose one of that model's traits. It can not benefit from that trait until the end of the round or while that Suspect is in play.

traits.name: I Bought this Place
traits.description: When a friendly model with Rank: {RANK_FREEAGENT_ICON} starts its activation, you may spend 1 Business Counter to allow that model to benefit from this model's Inspire trait as if it had Rank: {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON}.

traits.name: Sewer's Assault
traits.description: When this model uses a Sewer marker, it may immediately perform a free Manipulate action to place or reveal a Suspect within 2" and LoS, or perform a free Attack action. This model may not repeat the same Tactical Action per round.

traits.name: Sewer's Retreat
traits.description: Once per round, after resolving an enemy Attack action that targeted this model and it is not suffering KO or was removed as a Casualty, target a Sewer marker within 4". You may place this model in contact with another Sewer marker.

traits.name: Sewers Nightmare {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: If this model uses a Sewer marker this turn, its next attack this activation gains 2 free Effort and +1 bonus to its attack dice rolls.

traits.name: Fear of the Dark
traits.description: When this model places a Suspect, target X enemy models within 8" and LoS. Each model must suffer {STUN_ICON}{STUN_ICON} or suffers the Terror Status, at the choice of its owner. X is equal to the number of friendly Suspects within 4".

traits.name: Back to the Nightmare
traits.description: Once per round, when an Objective card is removed from the Terror pile, after the current action is resolved, this model may be removed from the gaming area and use the Shadowed Nightmare trait to enter again later.

traits.name: Listen to the Coin
traits.description:
At the start of the round, gain the following based on which Coin card is in play.
-Twisted Coin: At the end of the Execute the Plan phase, target up to 2 Suspects and Move 4" them. 
-Good Coin: Gain 1 Resource point this round.

traits.name: Coin Flip {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Search your Objective deck for a Coin card and immediately play it. Shuffle your Objective deck.

traits.name: Order in the Court
traits.description:
Friendly models affected by this model's Inspire rule gain the following based on which Coin card is in play.
-Twisted Coin: Gain 1 free Effort when Attacking.
-Good Coin: Gain 1 free Effort when Defending.

traits.name: Parliament of Flowers
traits.description:
This model deploys as usual instead of using the Plants trait during Deploy Crews step. When a friendly model with the Plant trait within 8" of this model performs a Manipulate action, it can suffer 2 {BLOOD_ICON} to place a friendly Suspect.
In addition, this model’s Tendrils attack gains Reach +X and +X to Hit rolls (where X is equal to the number of another friendly models with the Plant trait within 8" of this model).

traits.name: Life Growth {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target a friendly Suspect within 8" and LoS, and a friendly model with the Plant trait in play. Place that model in contact with the targeted Suspect and remove it.

traits.name: Walking Plant
traits.description:
This model does not benefit from its Action Zone to perform Attack and Manipulate actions.
In addition, if this model starts its activation within 8" from a friendly model with the Elite Boss (Plants) trait, it removes 1 Damage, if not, it suffers 1 {BLOOD_ICON}.

traits.name: Growling Hound {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model within 8" and LoS. That model must take a Willpower roll. If unsuccesful, it must immediately Move X" directly away from this model (X is equal to the difference between the result and target's Willpower).

traits.name: Paramedic
traits.description: When this model places a Suspect, it can remove up to 2 Damage from a friendly model within 4" (not Vehicle). If this ability is used to recover a model that is yet to activate that round from KO, the opponent gains a Pass marker.

traits.name: Objection!
traits.description: Once per round, you may cancel the use of an Objective card used as a Resource with a X value (equal to double its VP) if this model has the same number of Suspects within 8", and then the opponent may pick and discard 1 Objective card from your hand.

traits.name: Law Interpretation
traits.description: At the start of the game, you can make an Interpretation deck with up to 3 Objective cards that you could have originally added to your deck. When this model places a Suspect, you can remove 1 card from your hand from the game, and then add 1 of the cards from the Interpretation deck to your hand.

traits.name: Trial
traits.description: As long as this model has a Suspect in contact, the opponent must play with the first card of their Objective deck face up, if this model gets the Suspect removed from contact, then discard the face up card.

traits.name: Artist {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Name an Objective card, draw a card from your Objective deck. If the card named is the one drawn, then you can keep it, if not discard it.

traits.name: Holiday
traits.description: When a model is removed as a Casualty within 8", this model may immediately Place a friendly Suspect in contact with this model or with a friendly model with Alias: Attorney Harvey Dent.

traits.name: True Fear
traits.description: When scoring any number of successful hits during an Attack, add 1 Fear card to your Objective deck.

traits.name: Boosted (X)
traits.description: While making an attack with this weapon, roll X additional attack dice.

traits.name: Terrible Visage
traits.description: When this model is placed by the Nightmare trait, you may Move the targeted Suspect instead of the opponent.

traits.name: Fear Dampening
traits.description: Models moving within this model's action radius suffer Impaired Movement.

traits.name: Terror Invigoration
traits.description: This model may throw X additional dice when taking Attack and Defense rolls (X is the number of cards in your Terror Pile).

traits.name: Disposable Nightmare
traits.description: When this model is removed, Discard a card from your deck.

traits.name: Intensive Treatment
traits.description: When this model targets a friendly model with the Nightmare trait using the Subliminal Suggestion trait, the targeted model may Move 4" before making the Attack.

traits.name: Fear Advantage
traits.description: This model may use the Protect Me! Trait on a friendly model with the Nightmare trait without needing to perform an Effort.

traits.name: Apparition {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Place this model in contact with the target friendly model that has the Nightmare trait, and then remove the target as a Casualty.

traits.name: Intense Fear
traits.description: At the end of step 6 of Prepare the Game, you must add a card from your Fear pile to your Objective deck

traits.name: Working in Advance
traits.description: At the end of step 6 of Prepare the Game, you must inflict the Terror Status onto an enemy model.

traits.name: Casting Fears {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Make an Attack with a friendly model with the Nightmare trait that is within 4" and LoS. If the target wants to Effort against this Attack, it must first suffer the Terror Status.

traits.name: Induction
traits.description: Once per round, when this model places a Suspect and/or when it affects an enemy model with the Inspire Fear trait you may place a Fear card into the Objective deck.

traits.name: Control Through Fear {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model with the Scared effect that is within 8" and LoS. That model suffers the Terror Status and you Move 4” it.

traits.name: Nightmare
traits.description:
At the start of a Nightmare's activation, you may place it in contact with a friendly Suspect. A Nightmare can only be Move or being Placed by this rule.
This model is always considered an active model and is inside the gaming area so, it may receive Audacity even if it is not in play.
• If a Nightmare gets Knocked Out, immediately remove it as a Casualty.
• When a Nightmare is removed as a Casualty, it can be returned to play again in a subsequent round , with its usual rules, removing all Damage and Statuses suffered previously by that Nightmare.
• Nightmares have a 4” ‘action zone’ radius. Within that radius, Nightmares are able to attack in Melee (no contact is needed), and may perform the Manipulate action.
• Nightmares cannot Place/Reveal Suspects more than once during its Activation.

traits.name: Tangible Fear
traits.description:
Any time a model within 4" of this model receives a hit, or fails a Willpower roll, you may discard 1 card from the top of the friendly objective deck (not cumulative).
In addition, while this model attacks, the target's Defense is reduced by 1 if its Willpower is less than 6.
While this model is attacked, the Attack value of the attacking model is reduced by 1 if its Willpower is less than 6.
In addition, this model cannot remove damage caused by other model’s effects unless specified.

traits.name: Insidious
traits.description: Enemy models within 4" of this model receive +1 to their Willpower roll results (cumulative up to 3).

traits.name: Red Hood Armor
traits.description: Whenever this model takes Damage, reduce the total number of Damage markers it receives by 1. In addition, after a close combat attack is resolved against this model, you can take 1 Effort and the attacking model receives {STUN_ICON}{STUN_ICON}.

traits.name: Troublemaker {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Search your Objective deck and add to your hand an Objective card with Type: {OT_VIOLENCE_ICON}. Shuffle your deck.

traits.name: Honor
traits.description:
Any enemy model may Challenge this model by spending a Special Action within 8" of it.
This model can Accept or Decline the Challenge.
If Accepted, this model and that model are Challenged. If Declined, this model suffers Enervating (3).

traits.name: Bushido Bat-Armor
traits.description: Enemy models cannot roll Strength dice against this model. In addition, this model rolls 1 additional Attack/Defense die against a target Challenged by this model.

traits.name: Challenge {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy model within 4" and LoS, target and this model are Challenged and can perform free Efforts while attacking and defending each other. This model cannot use this trait if it is already Challenged with another model.

traits.name: Battle Meditation
traits.description: When this model places a Suspect, you may discard 1 Objective card from your hand.

traits.name: Vengeance
traits.description: At the start of the game, target an enemy model that cannot have the Rank: {RANK_HENCHMAN_ICON} (unless no other option is available). Convert all the {STUN_ICON} damage this model inflicts to it to {BLOOD_ICON}. In addition, scored Dirty Job Objective cards provide 2 VP each (instead of 1) even if this model is not in the Gaming Area.

traits.name: Raised with Venom
traits.description: This round, this model also gains 2 free Efforts while defending if it already has used a Venom Dose.

traits.name: Moment of Glory
traits.description: If this model doesn't have an Audacity marker, at the start of its activation may take an Effort to count as having it for that activation.

traits.name: Protein's Shaker (Dose)
traits.description: A model may use a Protein's Shaker when an action is declared. If it does so, for the rest of the round the model may make 1 free Effort when performing a Melee Attack or Defending.

traits.name: Wrestler
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: The Dude
traits.description: Once per game, this model may ignore a rule targeting it.

traits.name: Super-Sight
traits.description:
This model ignores the Blind Status.
In addition, once per round, during one action, it can make up to 3 free Efforts.

traits.name: Enhanced Batlings
traits.description: Once per round, After this model does damage with a Ranged Attack to a single target within 8", you can place the target of the attack in contact with this model. If you placed a model in contact with this model as a result, immediately make a free special action to use the 360º Strike trait and then, immediately you can make a free Melee attack action.

traits.name: I'm Batman
traits.description: Once per round, during this model's activation, you can discard an Objective card with type {OT_MENACE_ICON} or {OT_VIOLENCE_ICON} and target a model within 8" and LoS, the target suffers the Scared status.

traits.name: Hear me Roar {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of the round, this model can interrupt its Movement action to perform a Manipulate action to place a Suspect, and then continue with its Movement action. The model must have enough actions available to use this trait.

traits.name: Mayor Cobblepot
traits.description:
You start the game with 2 Business Counters.
If this model is hit by an enemy attack (any type), you may Spend 1 Business Counter to nominate a friendly model within 4” and LoS (not a Vehicle) to take the attack instead. Resolve any Damage and/or Status against the nominated model.
In addition, scored Secret Equipment Bases Objective cards provide 3 VP each (instead of 2) even if this model is not in the Gaming Area.

traits.name: Hidden Penguins
traits.description:
Before both groups of both crews are selected, left models with the Expendable X Penguin Trait aside. When both groups are deployed, these models may be deployed within 4" from a Sewer marker. If the opponent have Hidden models, start with the player with setup initiative. These models must be placed out of LoS of all enemy models if possible, or at least 12” away from enemy models that can see it. If this is not possible, these models must be deployed in the usual DZ.

This Model May spend an Action to immediately perform an action with a friendly Model with the Expendable Penguin X Trait. And once per round, this model can perform a free action with 1 friendly model with the Expendable X Penguin Trait (you cannot repeat the same action with the same Penguin during the same round).

When this model places a Suspect, you may spend x Business counters to bring back a model previously removed as a Casualty with the Expendable Penguin X trait in contact with a Sewer marker.

traits.name: Berserker Fury {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model gains +1 bonus to its Attack dice rolls and counts as two models for scoring Objective cards.

traits.name: Princess of Tamaran
traits.description: While this model is the target of the Stubborn Resilience Objective card and has a friendly Suspect within 4", increase the Invulnerability value of this model to (3).

traits.name: Teen Titans
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Dark Intimidation (Spell)
traits.description: Special Action. 1 Magic Counter. Enemy models within 8" and LoS cannot make Efforts when Attacking friendly models.

traits.name: Suggest
traits.description: If any Damage is dealt with this weapon, Set an enemy Suspect in contact with the target (if able).

traits.name: Soul-Self (Spell)
traits.description: Movement Action. 1 Magic Counter. Target up to X friendly models or friendly Thwarts within 4" of this model (X is equal to the additional Magic Counters spent to Cast this Spell). This model is placed within 8" and all the targeted models/Thwarts are placed within 4" of the final position of this model. This model ignores up to 2 Damage this round.

traits.name: Healing Radiance
traits.description: A friendly model within 4" of the target of the attack, removes up to 1 Damage.

traits.name: Shapeshifting Human Progress
traits.description: This model allows you to keep aside all the models that have in its Alias: Beast Boy - (X) without recruiting they. When a model uses the Shapeshifting trait to place this model in play, during this round this model may use the Vigilante's Work trait to place or reveal a Suspect marker within 3” and LoS instead of in contact.

traits.name: Shapeshifting Hawk Progress
traits.description: This model cannot recruited in your crew, and can only be placed in game by a model with the Shapeshifting trait. When a model uses the Shapeshifting trait to place this model in play, this model may use this round the Fly trait as a free action.

traits.name: Shapeshifting Gorilla Progress
traits.description: This model cannot recruited in your crew, and can only be placed in game by a model with the Shapeshifting trait. When a model uses the Shapeshifting trait to place this model in play, this model Obstinate trait is with up to 3 Efforts instead of 1 this round.

traits.name: Shapeshifting Tiger Progress
traits.description: This model cannot recruited in your crew, and can only be placed in game by a model with the Shapeshifting trait. When a model uses the Shapeshifting trait to place this model in play, if this model inflicts Damage on an enemy model, you may place at the end of this activation the target in contact with this model.

traits.name: Insider Agent
traits.description: Sleeper Agent's markers within 8" of this model are moved towards the model of your choice.

traits.name: Walking Suspects
traits.description: When this model performs the Manipulate action to Place or Reveal a Suspect, it is immediately removed as a Casualty.

traits.name: Infected
traits.description: If the target suffers Damage as result of an Attack made with this weapon, becomes Infected.

traits.name: Freed
traits.description: This model can only be recruited if the crew also includes The Batman Who Laughs model.

traits.name: First to Fall
traits.description: This model may be targeted by a Cranial Bomb Activated card even if it is not the active model.

traits.name: Freeze Well {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Once per round, when a ranged attack of this model  score at least 1 Successful hit, the target makes a Willpower roll. If unsuccessful, that model places a new friendly Suspect in contact ignoring the usual placement rules. That suspect is frozen.

traits.name: Ice Age
traits.description: Once per game chose one: Search in your objecive deck for a card with the name Searching for Nora and put it in your hand, or, Move all friendly models with the "Cold Acclimation" trait within 4" of Mr Freeze or a frozen suspect 4".

traits.name: Bat Credit Card
traits.description: This model’s crew gains an additional $350 Funding.

traits.name: Flying Kick {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of this round, if, at the beginning of the attacker's activation, the target was in a lower position than the attacker, his next melee attack gains Devastating, Push (4) and the target places a new friendly Suspect in contact ignoring the usual placement rules even if the target is KO'd due to the attack, but does not place any suspect if it is eliminated as a casualty.

traits.name: Kowabunga! {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of this round, This model does not take Damage, nor can it be removed as a Casualty, as a result of Falling. In addition, if this model ends a movement action in a lower position than it started, it can immediately move an extra 4" and unarmed attacks gains Devastating until the end of the turn.

traits.name: Protected Lips
traits.description: This model is inmune to Poison Status and Mortal Kiss trait.

traits.name: Let's cool it for now
traits.description: Once per round, after this model places a suspect, target  another model within 4" of that suspestc, it gains +1 {+DEF_ICON} or {-DEF_ICON}

traits.name: Nature's Arm {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of the round, This model may place or reveal a Suspect marker within 4” and LoS instead of in contact. An enemy model in contact with that suspect increases the Slow Status value by (2), unless it doesn't have it, then it suffers the Slow (2) Status.

traits.name: Speedster
traits.description:
If. you recruit a model with the Speedster trait, you must play also with the Speedforce Deck, shuffle it at the start of the game and keep it aside. A Speedster model may use Speed Powers, once each per round, that needs to draw Speedforce cards without seeing their content from the Speedforce Deck of its player and assign they to your Speedforce Discard pile face down.
Each time your Speedforce Deck becomes empty, the opponent draw the first 2 cards of your Speedforce Discard pile, and choose 1 and apply its effects to your model with Speedster, keep it near him to remember that card is assigned to it. Then shuffle again all your other Speedforce cards together and form the Speedforce Deck again. If any SpeedForce card is yet to be drawn when that happens, when the Speedforce deck is formed again, continue drawing the remaining cards.
You can only recruit 1 model with the Speedster trait in your crew.

traits.name: Speed Force Master (X)
traits.description: Once per roll, this model can draw up to X Speedforce cards to add X Attack dice to a melee attack or X dice to its Defense rolls.

traits.name: Speed Attack (X)
traits.description: This attack is a Speed Power and you need to draw X SpeedForce cards to use it.

traits.name: Fast Combo (X)
traits.description: For every two successful hits in its attack roll while using this weapon (before the enemy rolls to defend), this model gains an additional hit. This attack is a Speed Power and you need to draw X SpeedForce cards to use it.

traits.name: Molecular Control (1)
traits.description: When this model performs a movement action, can draw up to X Speedforce cards to ignore terrain elements (Can pass through walls or buildings, but cannot end its movement inside one).

traits.name: Super Speed (X)
traits.description: When this model is going to perform a movement action, it can draw up to X SpeedForce cards to increase its movement by 4" for each card drawn.

traits.name: Blood Cultist
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Team Flash
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Bat Family
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Doom Patrol
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Team Arrow
traits.description: Keyword.

traits.name: Treasure Hunter
traits.description: When this model inflicts the Steal Status, the opponent must target 1 of their Suspects in play. That Suspect is also now a Treasure for you. This model can Reveal as a free action a Treasure and when doing it, you may search for any card on your Objective deck and add it to your hand.

traits.name: Vendetta
traits.description: When this model damages an enemy with an action, it immediately Reveals an enemy Suspect within 8" of the target.

traits.name: Antagonist (X-Y)
traits.description: This model can roll X additional Attack/Defense dice when targeting/being targeted by a model that has the Y trait.

traits.name: Small Nightmare
traits.description: This model doesn't follows the Nightmare trait rules to come back to play while removed as a Casualty, instead they can be Set in play in contact with a friendly Suspect when a Fear card is returned to the Fear pile, they can only take an activation if they didn't take it before. In addition, this model gains +1 Defense against enemy Ranged Attacks.

traits.name: Trap Master
traits.description: Once per round, when an enemy model reveals a Suspect within 8" and in LoS with this model, that enemy model suffers {STUN_ICON}{BLOOD_ICON} Damage and Enervating (1) and Slow (4) Status.

traits.name: Wah! Wah! Wah!
traits.description: All the models within 8" and LoS to this model counts as having Audacity for the Stage Play Objective card.

traits.name: Umbrella's Knout Gas {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Target an enemy within 4" and LoS. That model must take an Endurance Roll. If not successful, it suffers the Enervating (3) Status.

traits.name: Hand!!
traits.description: This model can only Sets and Reveals Suspects if it is within the Inspire range.

traits.name: Bodyguard Mission
traits.description: This model Security Chief trait also affect friendly models with Rank: {RANK_LEADER_ICON} and/or {RANK_SIDEKICK_ICON}.

traits.name: Honor among Thieves
traits.description: Once per game, during this models activation, you may return a Cranial Bomb Activated card from your hand to the Cranial bomb pile.

traits.name: Spray Can (X)
traits.description: A model Equipped with a Spray Can when it Sets a Suspect may expend 1 of its Spray Cans to Vandalize a Scenery element, Streetlampt or Sewer in contact with that Suspect.

traits.name: Shield Breaker
traits.description: All attacks made with this weapon ignores the Protective, Defensive, Light Armor, Medium Armor and Heavy Armor traits.

traits.name: Really Tenacious
traits.description: Unless this model was removed as a Casualty by a Cranial Bomb Activated card or the Henchman Bomb trait, at the start of the Raise the Plan phase, you can place this model in contact with a friendly Suspect.

traits.name: King of Spades {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Another friendly model with the Spades trait performs a Move 4" and then a Tactical Action immediately. When resolved continue with this model's activation.

traits.name: Card Fly {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Once per round, this model may add +8” to its basic move distance, and can move in any direction (including vertically). When using this ability, the model can move over obstacles and Difficult Ground without extra cost or penalty. Up to X friendly models within 8" and LoS benefits from this trait use this round (X is equal to the number of cards discarded from your hand that shares the Suit of this model).

traits.name: Cheat
traits.description: Once per round, when this model is targetd or targets an enemy model, you place 1 Objective card from your hand face down in front f you. You may change 1 card of your roll or a result of your opponent's roll for this card value. Then discard it.

traits.name: Queen of Spades {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Another friendly model with the Spades trait performs a Move 4" and then a Manipulate Action immediately. When resolved continue with this model's activation.

traits.name: Herald of Spades
traits.description: This model may use the King of Spades trait as long it is within 8" and LoS to the King of Spades model.

traits.name: Jack of Spades
traits.description: When a friendly model with the Spades trait within 8" and LoS to this model Sets a Suspect, you may Discard a card.

traits.name: For My Lords!
traits.description: When a friendly model within 4" that shares a Keyword with this model is the target of an Attack, this model may be the new target. Ignoring LoS and distance. During Ranged Attacks, only the modifiers that affected the original target are applied, except for the Protective trait of this model, which is applied.

traits.name: Spades
traits.description: Keyword. If this model has a friendly Suspect within 4" during an Attack roll, you may replace a drawn card with a card from your hand. That card gains +1 to the result.

traits.name: Hail to the Queen!
traits.description: This model counts as having the Spades, Clubs, Diamonds, and Hearts keywords.

traits.name: Poison Catalyst {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: A model within 4" suffering the Poison Status must make a Poison test.

traits.name: Fire Catalyst
traits.description: Enemy models within 4" suffer Damage inflicted by the Fire Status when the opponent Discards or Scores a {OT_VIOLENCE_ICON} type card as if it had the Burn keyword.

traits.name: As Blind as a Bat
traits.description: When this model Sets a Suspect and you have a ? facedown card in play from a previous activation, you may reveal it and activate its Trap effect using this model as the point of origin/triggering model. Then discard that card.

traits.name: Showmanship!
traits.description: During this model's activation you may play a Resource without paying its cost if this model has 2 enemy models within 4".

traits.name: Knowledge is Power
traits.description: During this model's activation, it gains a Free Special Action if you have looked at the opponent's deck or hand this Round.

traits.name: Tracking Device {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: Until the end of the round, each time an enemy model ends a Movement Action within 8", you may Move a friendly model within Inspire Range 4" at the end of that activation.

traits.name: A.R.G.U.S. Commander
traits.description: When a friendly model gains a Task counter within 4" of this model, another friendly model within Inspire range gains a Task counter.

traits.name: Reckless Leader
traits.description: During this model's activation, you may add a Cranial Bomb Activated card to your hand to give 2 models without Audacity an Audacity marker. You must be able to add the card to your hand in order to activate this trait.

traits.name: You're Fun
traits.description: During the first Raise the Plan phase of the game, target an enemy model. When an Objective card is scored during the activation of the target, this model gains a Free Manipulate action until the end of the round.

traits.name: Catwoman's Target
traits.description: A model with Alias (Catwoman) gains 2 Free Efforst while targeting this model with an Attack. While this model has a model with Alias (Catwoman) within 8",  it gains 1 Free Effort when Attacking and Defending against models other than that Catwoman model.

traits.name: Release the Boys!
traits.description: If this model has placed a Suspect within 4" and LoS of an enemy model this activation, you can place 2 new friendly models with Alias (Bud) and (Lou) within 4" of this model, they can be activated this round as usual and the opponent gains 2 Pass on Activations. If you do so, place a new friendly model with Alias: Harley Quinn (BTG) in contact and remove this model from the game. Transfer all Damage, Statuses, Audacity, and any Objectives that had targeted this model to the new model. If there were any unspent actions remaining, continue this activation using the new model. No Objectives may be scored as a result of this trait.

traits.name: Rain of Bullets {SPECIAL_ICON}
traits.description: This model next ranged attack this round reduce its Rof to 1 but gains Expansive and deals 1 additional {BLOOD_ICON} on a successful hit.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Burn X
traits.description: You can play this Resource by paying X Resource points to discard this card from your hand, placing it at the bottom of your Objective deck.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Exception (In Play)
traits.description: This Resource is not played in the usual way. This Resource may only be used while this card is in play as an Objective and does not be discarded when used.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Exception (When Scoring)
traits.description: This Resource is not played in the usual way. The effect of this Resource is used when this card is scored.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Exception (Scored Pile)
traits.description: This Resource is not played in the usual way. The effect of this Resource applies while this card is scored.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Limited
traits.description: Only 1 card with this name can be in play at a time.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Opening
traits.description: If this card is included in your Objective deck, you must put it aside before the game starts. At the end of step 4 of Prepare the Game, you must play this card as an Objective. If a card with this keyword is going to be discarded, remove it from the game instead.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Vandalized!
traits.description: When you score this Objective, Use a counter to mark a Scenery Element, Lamppost, or Sewer within 4” as Vandalized!. That is now considered a Vandalized element.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Talon’s Prey
traits.description: Target an enemy model within 4” of a friendly Owl marker and a friendly Suspect. Mark that model as Prey. Traits and Objectives refering to Prey only refer to enemy models marked as Prey. If this resource is used more than once this round, it increases its cost to 1 this round. Only one model can be Prey. If you mark a model as Prey and there is already another marked model in play, the previous model is no longer considered Prey.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Gut Feeling
traits.description: When you score this Objective, you may draw 1 additional Objective Card, then you must discard one of them.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Chaos
traits.description: When you score this Objective, both players discard an Objective card at random.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Plot
traits.description: When this card is removed from the Play Area, discard all cards under it. If there is at least 1 card under it, you may Discard this card at any time.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Shadow’s Plan
traits.description:
The Level of Shadow’s Plan is equal to the number of friendly Suspects in play:

0-2 Suspects: Level 1.
3-5 Suspects: Level 2.
6-8 Suspects: Level 3.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Trap
traits.description: This Recourse cannot be played as usual. When this card is revealed by playing it as a ?, resolve the effect. A resource resolved in this game doesn’t go to the Spend Resource pile, if it is Scored it goes to the scored cards, if not, it is discarded.

traits.name: Objective Keyword - Timer X
traits.description: Place a numeric counter with a value equal to X. Reduce the value of the counter by 1 at the end of each subsequent activation.
